lg.l: kathitaṃ bhāratākhyānaṃ purāṇaṃ ca paraṃ tvayā |
tattvā pṛcchāma vai janma kārttikeyasya dhīmataḥ || 11 ||
pariṣvajya paraṃ premṇā provāca vacanaṃ śubham || 21 ||
suparṇyāścātha mātṝṇāṃ kṛttikānāṃ kathaṃ ca saḥ || 25 ||
svāmitvaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca svakṛtāni pracakṣate || 2 ||
tasmai devāya somāya praṇamya prayataḥ śuciḥ |
devānāṃ varadānaṃ ca vasiṣṭhasya ca dhīmataḥ |
balisaṃyamanaṃ caiva devyāḥ samaya eva ca |
devānāṃ varadānaṃ ca śukrasya ca visarjanam |
yāṃ śrutvā pāpakarmāpi gacchecca paramāṃ gatim || 1 ||
putra putreti cāpyukto brahmā śarveṇa dhīmatā |
sa dattvā brahmaṇe śambhuḥ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ jñānasaṃhitam |
brahmaṃ ca yo vidadhe putramagre jñānaṃ ca yaḥ prahiṇoti sma tasmai |
tamātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrāsteṣāṃ śāntiḥ śāśvatī netareṣām || 9 ||
sa vyāsa pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā svadīptyā parayā yutam |
sa tuṣṭāva nato bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim || 12 ||
sraṣṭre vai lokatantrāya brahmaṇaḥ pataye namaḥ || 13 ||
dṛṣṭidāya ca sarveṣāṃ svayaṃ vai darśanāya ca || 16 ||
manasaḥ karaṇānāṃ ca tatraiva niyamasya ca || 17 ||
bhūtānāṃ guṇakartre ca śaktidāya tathaiva ca |
kartre hyaṇḍasya mahyaṃ ca acintyāyāgrajāya ca |
aprameya pitarnityaṃ prīto no diśa śakvarīm || 18 ||
prajārthaṃ yacca te taptaṃ tapa ugraṃ suduścaram |
tābhiḥ svaṃ svaṃ samādāya bhāvaṃ divyamatarkitam |
tatraivaṃ yoginaḥ sūkṣmaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā |
rudraḥ sraṣṭā hi sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ tava ca prabho |
sarveṣāṃ manasi sadāvatiṣṭhamāno jānānaḥ śubhamaśubhaṃ ca bhūtanāthaḥ |
taṃ devaṃ pramathapatiṃ praṇamya bhaktyā nityaṃ vai śaraṇamupaimi sūkṣmasūkṣmam || 30 ||
prājāpatyaṃ tato labdhvā prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ pracakrame |
prajāstāḥ sṛjyamānāśca na vivardhanti tasya ha || 1 ||
śambhuḥ prāha varaṃ vatsa yācasveti pitāmaham || 4 ||
sa jñātvā tasya saṃkalpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ |
āgataṃ pitaraṃ mā tvaṃ yasmātputraṃ samīhase |
sa ca te putratāṃ yātvā madīyo gaṇanāyakaḥ |
dhanuḥ pinākaṃ śūlaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ paraśureva ca || 9 ||
brahmā cakre tadā ceṣṭiṃ putrakāmaḥ prajāpatiḥ || 11 ||
taddhi māheśvaraṃ tejaḥ saṃdhitaṃ brahmaṇi srutam |
atha kālena mahatā kalpe 'tīte punaḥ punaḥ |
prajāsu ca vivṛddhāsu prayāge yajataśca ha || 23 ||
khinnā vivadamānāśca na ca paśyāma yatparam || 26 ||
etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ deva ciraṃ hṛdi samāsthitam |
tvaṃ hi vettha yathātattvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paramaṃ hi naḥ || 27 ||
kena cādhiṣṭhitaṃ viśvaṃ ko nityaḥ kaśca śāśvataḥ || 28 ||
kathaṃ paśyema taṃ caiva etannaḥ śaṃsa sarvaśaḥ || 30 ||
yakṣāṇāmasurāṇāṃ ca ye ca kutra pravartakāḥ |
utthāya prāñjaliḥ prāha rudreti triḥ plutaṃ vacaḥ || 32 ||
sa cāpi tapasā śakyo draṣṭuṃ nānyena kenacit |
tasya vaśyāni bhūtāni tenedaṃ dhāryate jagat || 33 ||
kiṃ tanmahattapo deva yena dṛśyeta sa prabhuḥ |
tanno vadasva deveśa varadaṃ} cābhidhatsva naḥ || 35 ||
deśaṃ ca vaḥ pravakṣyāmi yasmindeśe cariṣyatha || 36 ||
tato manomayaṃ cakraṃ sa sṛṣṭvā tānuvāca ha |
yatrāsya nemiḥ śīryeta sa deśastapasaḥ śubhaḥ |
tato mumoca taccakraṃ te ca tatsamanuvrajan || 38 ||
tasya vai vrajataḥ kṣipraṃ yatra nemiraśīryata |
naimiśaṃ tatsmṛtaṃ nāmnā puṇyaṃ sarvatra pūjitam || 39 ||
gandharvavidyādharacāraṇaiśca sādhyaiśca viśvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ stutaṃ ca || 41 ||
dadau sa rūpī bhagavāndarśanaṃ sattriṇāṃ śubhaḥ || 4 ||
sthitiṃ ca kṛtsnāṃ vaṃśāṃśca yugamanvantarāṇi ca |
tāmapṛcchanta kā nveṣā vāyuṃ devaṃ mahādhiyam || 16 ||
śuddhāḥ stha tapasā sarve mahāndharmaśca vaḥ kṛtaḥ || 17 ||
brahmaṇaścaiva saṃvādaṃ purā yajñasya caiva ha || 21 ||
yajñairiṣṭvā purā devo brahmā dīptena tejasā |
sa dṛṣṭvā dīptimāndevo dīptyā paramayā yutaḥ |
amanyata na me 'nyo 'sti samo loke na cādhikaḥ || 24 ||
ahaṃ sraṣṭā hi bhūtānāṃ nānyaḥ kaścana vidyate |
niyantā lokakartā ca na mayāsti samaḥ kvacit || 26 ||
uvāca cainaṃ dīptātmā maivaṃ maṃsthā mahāmate |
ayaṃ hi tava saṃmoho vināśāya bhaviṣyati || 27 ||
sraṣṭā tvaṃ caiva nānyo 'sti tathāpi na yaśaskaram || 28 ||
ahaṃ kartā hi bhūtānāṃ bhuvanasya tathaiva ca |
karomi na ca saṃmohaṃ yathā tvaṃ deva katthase || 29 ||
tamuvāca tadā brahmā na tvaṃ dhārayitā vibho |
ahameva hi bhūtānāṃ dhartā bhartā tathaiva ca |
uvāca caiva tau vedo naitadevamiti prabhuḥ || 31 ||
ahaṃ śreṣṭho mahābhāgau na vadāmyanṛtaṃ kvacit |
śṛṇudhvaṃ mama yaḥ kartā bhūtānāṃ yuvayośca ha || 32 ||
yenāhaṃ tava dattaśca kṛtastvaṃ ca prajāpatiḥ || 33 ||
sarvaṃ tasmātprasūtaṃ vai nānyaḥ kartāsti naḥ kvacit || 34 ||
ahaṃ śrutīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ netā sraṣṭā tathaiva ca || 35 ||
evamukte tadā tena mahāñchabdo babhūva ha |
vyomagaśca ciraṃ bhūtvā bhūmigaḥ sambabhūva ha || 38 ||
tato brahmā diśaḥ sarvā nirīkṣya mukhapaṅkajaiḥ |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcamaṃ tasya śiro vai krodhajaṃ mahat |
tataḥ suptotthita iva saṃjñāṃ labdhvā mahātapāḥ |
namaḥ sarvasya sraṣṭre ca draṣṭre sarvasya te namaḥ || 48 ||
tvameva sraṣṭā lokānāṃ mantā dātā tathā vibho |
cakṣuṣā tena sa tadā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ |
viśadāṃ putra putreti pūrvaṃ devena coditām || 56 ||
yacca pūrvaṃ mayā proktastvaṃ tadā sutamārgaṇe || 57 ||
sa prāpya paramaṃ jñānaṃ mūḍha tvā vinayiṣyati || 58 ||
stavenānena tuṣṭo 'smi kiṃ dadāni ca te 'nagha || 60 ||
tataḥ sa bhagavānhṛṣṭaḥ praṇamya śubhayā girā |
icchāmi śiraso hyasya dhāraṇaṃ sarvadā tvayā |
tathā ca kṛtyamuddiśya paśyeyaṃ tvā yathāsukham || 63 ||
ākhyeyaṃ nāpi cājñāya na śaṭhāya na mānine || 68 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā tadupasthaṃ tu viṣṇurvai yogacakṣuṣā |
papāta sā ca vistīrṇā yojanārdhaśataṃ tadā || 5 ||
tamuvāca tato devaḥ prahasya vacanaṃ śubham || 6 ||
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te varado 'smi tavādya vai || 8 ||
eṣa eva varaḥ ślāghyo yadahaṃ devatādhipam |
devaśchāyāṃ tato vīkṣya kapālasthe tadā rase |
taṃ tadāśvāsya nikṣipya naraṃ viṣṇoḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ |
ya idaṃ narajanmeha śṛṇuyādvā paṭheta vā |
sa kīrtyā parayā yukto viṣṇuloke mahīyate || 14 ||
imaṃ lokaṃ varāmbhobhiḥ pāvayitvā ca suprabhe |
puṇyā ca sarvasaritāṃ bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ || 10 ||
bhittvā śūlena saṃkruddhā vigatāsuṃ ca cakrire || 20 ||
hate tasmiṃstadā devo diśaḥ sarvā avaikṣata |
bhakṣayanti sma mahiṣaṃ mitvā mitvā yatastu tāḥ |
śmeti hi procyate pāpaṃ kṣayaṃ śānaṃ vidurbudhāḥ |
evaṃ tatra naraḥ pāpaṃ sarvameva prahāsyati |
tataḥ sa tatra saṃsthāpya devasyārcādvayaṃ śubham |
tato devaḥ saha gaṇai rūpaṃ vikṛtamāsthitaḥ |
paṭhennaro yaḥ śṛṇuyācca sarvadā tripiṣṭapaṃ gacchati so 'bhinanditaḥ || 38 ||
yadā vo bhavitā vighnaṃ tadā niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥ || 3 ||
vighnaṃ taccaiva saṃtīrya tapastaptvā ca bhāsvaram |
niḥsomāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā kṛtsnāmetāṃ tato dvijāḥ |
ūcuścainaṃ mahābhāgā hṛtaḥ somo hi naḥ prabho |
na ca taṃ vedmi kenāsau kva vā nīta iti prabhuḥ || 11 ||
tapasā svena rājendra paśya no balamuttamam || 15 ||
tuṣṭāsmi vatsāḥ kiṃ vo 'dya karomi varadāsmi vaḥ |
tamānaya namaste 'stu eṣa no vara uttamaḥ || 19 ||
sā tathoktā viniścitya dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā |
te tamāsādya ṛṣayaḥ prāpya yajñaphalaṃ mahat |
āgatya tānṛṣīnprāha tapaḥ kuruta mā ciram || 23 ||
te saha brahmaṇā gatvā mainākaṃ parvatottamam |
te yuktā brahmaṇā sārdhamṛṣayaḥ saha devataiḥ |
divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prayacchāmi paśyadhvaṃ māṃ yathepsitam || 29 ||
tamapaśyanta te sarve devā divyena cakṣuṣā |
prasamīkṣya mahāsureśakālaṃ manasā cāpi vicārya durvisahyam |
te dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ sarve sabrahmakāḥ surāḥ |
namaḥ parvatavāsāya śirohartre ca me purā || 7 ||
namo narasya kartre ca sthitikartre namaḥ sadā |
śivaḥ saumyaśca deveśa bhava no bhaktavatsala || 10 ||
varaṃ brūta pradāsyāmi suniścintya sa ucyatām || 12 ||
yadi tuṣṭo 'si deveśa yadi deyo varaśca naḥ |
sarvakāryeṣu ca sadā hitaḥ pathyaśca śaṃkaraḥ || 15 ||
eṣa no dīyatāṃ deva varo varasahasrada || 16 ||
ardhena tejasaḥ svasya mukhādulkāṃ sasarja ha |
sākāśaṃ dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca mahimnā vyāpya viṣṭhitā |
upatasthe ca deveśaṃ dīpyamānā yathā taḍit || 19 ||
puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ sthānaṃ vai bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 23 ||
svarṇākṣīṃ cāsṛjaṃ devīṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tena tatsmṛtam || 24 ||
nivatsyatha mayājñaptāḥ svarṇākṣaṃ vai tataśca ha |
upoṣya triguṇāṃ rātriṃ caruṃ kṛtvā nivedya ca |
yatra tatra mṛtaḥ so 'pi brahmaloke nivatsyati || 27 ||
evaṃ sa tānṛṣīnuktvā dṛṣṭvā saumyena cakṣuṣā |
jayati jaladavāhaḥ sarvabhūtāntakālaḥ śamadamaniyatānāṃ kleśahartā yatīnām |
jananamaraṇahartā ceṣṭatāṃ dhārmikāṇāṃ vividhakaraṇayuktaḥ khecaraḥ pādacārī || 32 ||
sā devī tryambakaproktā tatāpa suciraṃ tapaḥ |
vāyvāhārā punaścāpi abbhakṣā bhūya eva ca || 1 ||
uvāca brūhi tuṣṭo 'smi devi kiṃ karavāṇi te || 2 ||
na hi yena śarīreṇa kriyate paramaṃ tapaḥ |
tataḥ sā tadvacaḥ śrutvā yogāddevī manasvinī |
anyāḥ sṛjasva bhadraṃ te prajā mṛtyusamanvitāḥ |
tena coktaṃ sthito 'smīti sthāṇustena tataḥ smṛtaḥ || 10 ||
sthito 'smi vacanātte 'dya vaktavyo nāsmi te punaḥ || 11 ||
ye tvime mānasāḥ sṛṣṭā mahātmāno mahābalāḥ |
cariṣyanti mayā sārdhaṃ sarva ete hi yājñikāḥ || 12 ||
atha kāle gate vyāsa sa dakṣaḥ śāpakāraṇāt |
satī jñātvā tu tatsarvaṃ gatvā pitaramabravīt || 14 ||
ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca jāmātrā saha suvrata |
māṃ hitvā nārhase hyetāḥ saha bhartṛbhirarcitum || 15 ||
na tvaṃ tathā pūjayase saha bhartrā mahāvrate || 17 ||
tasmādyatte karomyadya śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham |
pūjāṃ gṛhāṇa tāṃ putri gaccha vā yatra rocate || 19 ||
ślāghyāṃ caivāpyaduṣṭāṃ ca śreṣṭhāṃ māṃ garhase pitaḥ || 21 ||
tataḥ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ manasā tryambakāya ha |
tataḥ sā dhāraṇāṃ kṛtvā āgneyīṃ sahasā satī |
dadāha vai svakaṃ dehaṃ svasamutthena vahninā || 25 ||
tāṃ jñātvā tryambako devīṃ tathābhūtāṃ mahāyaśāḥ |
tvaṃ caiva mama śāpena kṣatriyo bhavitā nṛpaḥ |
dharmavighnaṃ ca te tatra kariṣye krūrakarmaṇaḥ || 28 ||
tamuvāca tadā dakṣo dūyatā hṛdayena vai |
mayā yadi sutā svā vai proktā tyaktāpi vā punaḥ |
kiṃ tavātra kṛtaṃ deva ahaṃ tasyāḥ prabhuḥ sadā || 29 ||
bhūrloke vatsyase nityaṃ na svarloke kadācana || 30 ||
bhāgaṃ ca tava yajñeṣu dattvā sarve dvijātayaḥ |
bhūrloke hi dhṛte lokāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti śāśvatāḥ |
apaḥ spṛśanti śuddhyarthaṃ bhāgaṃ yacchanti me tataḥ |
bhāgānapaḥ spṛśanti sma tatra kā paridevanā || 36 ||
evaṃ sa bhagavāñchaptvā dakṣaṃ devo jagatpatiḥ |
kenākṣayāśca lokāḥ syuḥ khyātiśca paramā mune |
tathaiva cārcanīyatvaṃ satsu taṃ kathayasva me || 2 ||
kiṃ na paśyasi śailendra yato māṃ paripṛcchasi |
viveśa taṃ tadā deśaṃ sā gartā yatra bhūdhara || 8 ||
yāvattvaṃ jīvase vipra tāvadeva vayaṃ sthitāḥ |
nānyena tapasā putra na tīrthānāṃ phalena ca |
sa tatheti pratijñāya ārādhya ca vṛṣadhvajam |
svayaṃ ca rudradayitaḥ sukeśo nāma nāmataḥ |
sa evamukto ṛṣiṇā śailendro niyame sthitaḥ |
tapaścakāra vipulaṃ yena brahmā tutoṣa ha || 19 ||
brūhi tuṣṭo 'smi te śaila tapasānena suvrata || 20 ||
etadvaraṃ prayacchasva yadi tuṣṭo 'si naḥ prabho || 21 ||
kanyā bhavitrī śailendra sutā te varavarṇinī |
jyeṣṭhā ca sā bhavitrī te anye cānu tataḥ śubhe || 23 ||
āśrite dve aparṇā tu aniketā tapo 'carat |
pūrṇe pūrṇe sahasre tu āhāraṃ tena cakratuḥ |
aparṇā tu nirāhārā tāṃ mātā pratyabhāṣata |
sā tathoktā tadā mātrā devī duścaracāriṇī |
umā tāsāṃ variṣṭhā ca śreṣṭhā ca varavarṇinī |
yā tu tāsāṃ kumārīṇāṃ tṛtīyā hyekapāṭalā |
umā tu yā mayā tubhyaṃ kīrtitā varavarṇinī |
tvayā sṛṣṭamidaṃ viśvaṃ mā kṛtvā tadvināśaya || 36 ||
brūhi kiṃ te jaganmātaḥ prārthitaṃ samprasīda naḥ || 37 ||
yadarthaṃ tapaso hyasya caraṇaṃ me pitāmaha |
jānīṣe tattvametanme tataḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ punaḥ || 38 ||
sa tvāṃ svayaṃ samāgamya ihaiva varayiṣyati || 39 ||
sa devadevaḥ parameśvareśvaraḥ svayaṃ tavāyāsyati lokapo 'ntikam |
udārarūpo vikṛtābhirūpavānsamānarūpo na hi yasya kasyacit || 41 ||
tataḥ sa bhagavāndevo brahmā tāmāha susvaram |
devi yenaiva sṛṣṭāsi manasā yastvayā vṛtaḥ |
sa bhartā tava deveśo bhavitā mā tapaḥ kṛthāḥ || 1 ||
tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā brahmā vyāsa gireḥ sutām |
jagāmādarśanaṃ tasyāḥ sā cāpi virarāma ha || 2 ||
vikṛtaṃ rūpamāsthāya hrasvo bāhuka eva ca || 4 ||
tau prabhū mama dāne vai kanyāhaṃ dvijapuṃgava || 8 ||
sa ceddadāti māṃ vipra tubhyaṃ tadrucitaṃ mama || 9 ||
uvāca śailarājaṃ tamumāṃ me yaccha śailarāṭ || 10 ||
varayedyaṃ svayaṃ tatra sa bhartāsyā bhavediti || 13 ||
devi pitrā tavājñaptaḥ svayaṃvara iti śrutam |
tatra tvaṃ varayitrī yaṃ sa te bhartā kilānaghe || 15 ||
tenoktā sā tadā tatra bhāvayantī tadīritam |
atha vā te 'sti saṃdeho mayi vipra kathaṃcana |
gṛhītvā stabakaṃ sā tu hastābhyāṃ tatra saṃsthitam |
skandhe śambhoḥ samādāya devī prāha vṛto 'si me || 20 ||
tata evonmukhī sthitvā śilāyāṃ saṃviveśa ha || 28 ||
atha śuśrāva sā śabdaṃ bālasyārtasya śailajā |
sa kṛtvā bālarūpaṃ tu devadevaḥ svayaṃ śivaḥ |
śocāmi na svakaṃ dehaṃ grāhagrasto 'pi duḥkhitaḥ |
yathā śocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca tapasvinīm || 34 ||
śrutvā tu devī taṃ nādaṃ viprasyārtasya śobhanā |
utthāya pradrutā tatra yatra tiṣṭhatyasau dvijaḥ || 36 ||
taṃ gṛhītvā drutaṃ yāto madhyaṃ sarasa eva ha || 38 ||
athāha devī duḥkhārtā bālaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvratā || 39 ||
yo devi divase ṣaṣṭhe prathamaṃ samupaiti mām |
sa āhāro mama purā vihito lokakartṛbhiḥ || 41 ||
brahmaṇā vihito nūnaṃ nainaṃ mokṣye kathaṃcana || 42 ||
tena bālamimaṃ muñca grāharāja namo 'stu te || 43 ||
mā vyayaṃ tapaso devi kārṣīḥ śailendranandane |
nainaṃ mocayituṃ śakto devarājo 'pi sa svayam || 44 ||
dattaṃ tato bravīmi tvāṃ nāyaṃ mokṣamavāpsyati || 46 ||
atha vā te kṛpā devi bhṛśaṃ bāle śubhānane |
tatkṛtaṃ nātra saṃdeho mānyā me brāhmaṇā dṛḍham || 48 ||
tatte sarvaṃ mayā dattaṃ bālaṃ muñca mamāgrataḥ || 50 ||
uvāca cedaṃ tuṣṭātmā devīṃ lokasya dhāriṇīm |
tapaso hyarjanaṃ duḥkhaṃ tasya tyāgo na śasyate || 52 ||
gṛhāṇa tapa etacca bālaṃ cemaṃ śucismite |
tuṣṭo 'smi te viprabhaktyā varaṃ tasmāddadāmi te || 53 ||
na viprebhyastapaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhā me brāhmaṇā matāḥ || 54 ||
dattvā cāhaṃ na gṛhṇāmi grāhendra viditaṃ hi te |
na hi kaścinnaro grāha pradattaṃ punarāharet || 55 ||
tathoktastāṃ praśasyātha muktvā bālaṃ namasya ca |
bālo 'pi sarasastīre mukto grāheṇa vai tadā |
kartukāmāṃ tapo bhūyo jñātvā tāṃ śaṃkaraḥ svayam |
provāca vacanaṃ vyāsa mā kṛthāstapa ityuta || 60 ||
idaṃ paṭhedyo hi naraḥ sadaiva bālānubhāvācaraṇaṃ hi śambhoḥ |
sa dehabhedaṃ samavāpya pūto bhavedgaṇastasya kumāratulyaḥ || 63 ||
iti saṃcintya śailendraḥ kṛtvā hṛdi maheśvaram || 5 ||
āruhya sarvāmararāṭ sa vajraṃ bibhratsamāgātpurataḥ surāṇām || 9 ||
daṇḍaṃ samādāya kṛtānta āgādāruhya bhīmaṃ mahiṣaṃ javena || 12 ||
tārkṣyaṃ samāruhya mahīdhrakalpaṃ gadādharo 'sau tvaritaṃ sametaḥ || 17 ||
tathāśvinau devabhiṣagvarau tu ekaṃ vimānaṃ tvarayābhiruhya |
varānurūpaṃ pravidhāya veṣaṃ vṛndaṃ samāgātpurataḥ surāṇām || 20 ||
gandharvarājaḥ sa ca cārurūpī divyaṅgamo divyavimānacārī |
patnī ca śambhoḥ puruṣasya dhāmno gītā purāṇe prakṛtiḥ parārthā |
evaṃ yatastāṃ na viduḥ sureśā mohastatastānpara āviveśa |
sarvartupuṣpāṃ susugandhamālāṃ pragṛhya devī prasabhaṃ pratasthe || 27 ||
mālāṃ pragṛhya devyāṃ tu sthitāyāṃ devasaṃsadi |
akasmādatha taṃ devī śiśuṃ pañcaśikhaṃ sthitam |
nirvṛteva tadā tasthau kṛtvā hṛdi tameva tu || 31 ||
tato dṛṣṭvā śiśuṃ devā devyā utsaṅgavartinam |
vajraṃ kṣeptuṃ na śaśāka bāhuṃ cālayituṃ na ca || 34 ||
bhago nāma tato deva ādityaḥ kāśyapo balī |
tasyāpi śiraso devaḥ khālityaṃ pracakāra ha || 36 ||
yamasya stambhito daṇḍastejo vahneḥ śaśeḥ prabhā |
atha teṣu sthiteṣvevaṃ manyumatsu sureṣu tu |
ajastvamamaro deva sraṣṭā hartā vibhuḥ paraḥ |
amṛtaṃ paramātmā ca īśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ mahat |
iyaṃ ca prakṛtirdevī sadā te sṛṣṭikāraṇam |
tata evaṃ tadā brahmā vijñāpya parameśvaram |
mūḍhāḥ stha devatāḥ sarve nainaṃ budhyata śaṃkaram |
ayaṃ rudro mahādevaḥ śarvo bhīmaḥ kapardimān |
ugra īśāna ātmā ca ajaḥ śaṃkara eva ca || 48 ||
devadevaḥ paraṃ dhāma īśaḥ paśupatiḥ patiḥ |
brahmādyā nemire tūrṇaṃ sarva eva sureśvarāḥ || 55 ||
tasya devī tadā hṛṣṭā samakṣaṃ tridivaukasām |
ślāghyaḥ pūjyaśca vandyaśca sarveṣāṃ nastvamadya hi |
śarveṇa saha sambandho yasya te 'bhūdayaṃ mahān |
kriyatāṃ cāśu udvāhaḥ kimarthaṃ sthīyate param || 59 ||
tvameva kāraṇaṃ deva yena śarvādayaṃ mama || 60 ||
tata evaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā girirājñaḥ pitāmahaḥ |
udvāhaḥ kriyatāṃ deva iti devamuvāca ha |
tatkṣaṇācca tato vyāsa brahmaṇā kalpitaṃ puram |
devanadyo mahānadyaḥ siddhā munaya eva ca || 68 ||
tumbururnārado hāhā hūhū caiva tu sāmagāḥ |
agādhena tadā reje kṣīroda iva sāgaraḥ || 94 ||
manobhavodrekakarāḥ surāṇāṃ surāṅganānāṃ ca muhuḥ samīrāḥ || 102 ||
ṛtoḥ svabhāvācca madodbhavācca phullāsu śākhāsu nilīnapakṣāḥ |
parasparaṃ hi mālatyo bhāṣantya iva rejire || 109 ||
nīlāni nīlāmburuhaiḥ payāṃsi gaurāṇi gauraiśca sanāladaṇḍaiḥ |
śṛṅgāṇi tasya tu gireḥ karṇikāraiḥ supuṣpitaiḥ |
hastaṃ devasya devyāśca yogabandhe yuyoja ha || 131 ||
triśca taṃ jvalanaṃ devaṃ kārayitvā pradakṣiṇam || 133 ||
udvāhaḥ sa paro vṛtto yaṃ devā na viduḥ kvacit || 135 ||
namaḥ pitre 'tha sādhyāya viśvedevāya vai namaḥ |
namaḥ śarvāya sarvāya ugrāya varadāya ca || 18 ||
namo bhīmāya senānye paśūnāṃ pataye namaḥ |
namo vaiṣamyakartre ca guṇānāṃ vṛttidāya ca || 23 ||
śivaḥ saumyaḥ sukho draṣṭuṃ bhava somo hi naḥ prabho || 24 ||
draṣṭuṃ sukhaśca saumyaśca devānāmasmi bho surāḥ |
varaṃ brūta yatheṣṭaṃ ca dātāsmi vadatānaghāḥ || 26 ||
tataste praṇatāḥ sarve ūcuḥ sabrahmakāḥ surāḥ |
yadā kāryaṃ tadā nastvaṃ dāsyase varamīpsitam || 27 ||
lokāṃśca pramathaiḥ sārdhaṃ viveśa bhavanaṃ tataḥ || 28 ||
pārāśarya stavaṃ hīdaṃ śṛṇuyādyaḥ paṭheta vā |
prasādayaṃśca taṃ devaṃ papāta sa mahītale || 6 ||
patnī tu karuṇaṃ tasya vilalāpa suduḥkhitā |
tasyāśca karuṇāṃ śrutvā devau tau karuṇātmakau |
aśarīro 'pi te kāle kāryaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati || 10 ||
tadā tasya suto 'yaṃ syātpatiste sa bhaviṣyati || 11 ||
tataḥ sā taṃ varaṃ labdhvā kāmapatnī śubhānanā |
evaṃ dagdhvā sa kāmaṃ tu śaṃkaro mūḍhacetasam |
vasiṣṭho nāma viprendro māṃ kṛtvā hṛdi tapyate |
evamuktvā sa devīṃ tu bhaktiprītyā tadā vibhuḥ |
uvāca bhagavāngatvā brūhi kiṃ te dadāni te |
dadāmi divyaṃ cakṣuste paśya māṃ sagaṇaṃ dvija || 17 ||
dṛṣṭvā sa tu tamīśānaṃ praṇamya śirasā prabhum |
diśa naḥ paramaṃ yogamapatyaṃ matsamaṃ tathā |
brahma caivākṣayaṃ deva śamaṃ caiva paraṃ vibho |
akṣayatvaṃ ca vaṃśasya dharme ca matimakṣayām || 29 ||
dadāni te ṛṣiśreṣṭha pratibhāsyanti caiva te || 32 ||
nityaṃ tava bhaviṣyanti amaratvaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ || 33 ||
na syāddhi tattathā deva yathā vā manyase prabho || 35 ||
bhaviṣyaṃ nānyathā kuryāditi me niścitā matiḥ |
tathā tannātra saṃdeho vihitaṃ yadyathā mayā |
kena stoṣyāmi te deva yastvaṃ sarvajagatpatiḥ |
tvameva bhoktā bhojyaṃ ca kartā kāryaṃ tathā kriyā |
icchāmi dattaṃ deveśa eṣa me dīyatāṃ varaḥ || 7 ||
uvāca vacasā vyāsa diśaḥ sarvā vinādayan || 8 ||
tvayāhaṃ yācitaḥ śakte sa ca te saṃbhaviṣyati |
evamuktvā tu taṃ devaḥ prahasya ca nirīkṣya ca |
tatra me niśi rājendra sadaiva piśitāśanam || 3 ||
tatkuruṣva tathā kṣipraṃ kālo no nātyagādyathā || 7 ||
jāne sarvopayogaṃ ca jāne cāduṣṭatāṃ tava |
jāne stokaṃ ca piśitaṃ kāryaṃ cedaṃ tathāvidham |
mṛgyatāṃ piśitaṃ kṣipraṃ labdhavyaṃ yatra manyase || 10 ||
novāca kiṃcittaṃ sūdaṃ tūṣṇīmeva babhūva ha || 14 ||
kimasau jñāsyate rātrau tvayā bhūyaśca saṃskṛtam |
na dīyate vidhijñena tvaṃ tu māmavamanyase || 23 ||
tataḥ sa rājā svaṃ rājyamutsṛjya saha bhāryayā |
tataḥ putravadhaṃ ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmasutaḥ prabhuḥ |
notsasarja tadā krodhaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ kauśikaṃ prati |
sa baddhvā mahatīṃ kaṇṭhe śilāṃ brahmasutaḥ prabhuḥ |
tāmuvāca kutastvaṃ vai kasyaiṣa śrūyate dhvaniḥ |
sovāca dīnayā vācā rudatī śvaśuraṃ tadā || 9 ||
adhīyānasya caivāyaṃ dhvaniḥ putrasya te vibho |
udarasthasya te sūnormā duḥkhe tvaṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ || 11 ||
kṣāntiṃ dhṛtiṃ ca saṃsthitya prayayāvāśramaṃ muniḥ || 12 ||
dagdhena ca tvayā kiṃ me gaccha mukto 'si durmate || 15 ||
tataḥ sa mukto dīnātmā rākṣasaḥ krūrakarmakṛt |
gate niśācare rājā praṇamya śirasā munim |
kṛtāntena hatāḥ putrā nimittaṃ tatra rākṣasaḥ || 18 ||
brūhi kiṃ vā priyaṃ te 'dya karomi narapuṃgava || 19 ||
putraṃ ca śoṇakaṃ nāma janayāmāsa nirvṛtaḥ || 21 ||
taṃ śoṇakaṃ tato rājye svaṃ putramabhiṣicya saḥ |
tasyaivaṃ garvitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ pitāmahaḥ |
yaiste pitā mahābhāga bhakṣitaḥ saha sodaraiḥ |
ta evāgnau ca hotavyā viśvāmitrasya paśyataḥ |
anyeṣāṃ svasti sarvatra devānāṃ saha rākṣasaiḥ || 32 ||
ya eṣāṃ brāhmaṇo vāpi kṣatriyo vā durātmavān |
ya imaṃ śrāddhakāle vā daive karmaṇi vā dvijān |
śrāvayīta śucirbhūtvā na taṃ hiṃsanti rākṣasāḥ || 40 ||
niśāmya vipraḥ kulasiddhisambhavaṃ na rākṣasaṃ gacchati yonisambhavam || 41 ||
evaṃ tava pitā vyāsa rakṣaḥsattraṃ samāharat |
kariṣyati gatiṃ caiva iti vedavido viduḥ || 4 ||
putraḥ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vihīnaḥ prajayā vibho || 5 ||
tasya kālena mahatā tapasā bhāvitasya tu |
umāpatirvaraṃ prādātsa ca vavre sutaṃ śubham || 8 ||
kṣetraṃ supariśuddhaṃ ca svaputro yatra sambhavet || 9 ||
tasyāṃ sa janayāmāsa varaṃ dattvā mahātapāḥ |
tasya putrāśca catvāraḥ kanyā caikā sumadhyamā || 13 ||
parāśare tu garbhasthe vipratvaṃ gādhije gate |
saivamuktā tu taṃ gatvā vasiṣṭhaṃ prāha duḥkhitā |
evaṃ kuru mahābhāge māṃ nayasva yathepsitam |
mā te krūraḥ sa gādheyaḥ śāpaṃ dadyātsudustaram || 19 ||
gādheyasya tataḥ sā tu juhvato 'gniṃ divākare |
vasiṣṭhasya ca tāṃ kṣāntiṃ jñātvā sa ṛṣipuṃgavaḥ || 24 ||
vairaṃ samāptaṃ lokānāṃ hitārthaṃ punareva ca || 28 ||
kathaṃ nandī samutpannaḥ kathaṃ cārādhya śaṃkaram |
abhūdṛṣiḥ sa dharmātmā śilādo nāma vīryavān |
ṛṣīṇāṃ pataye nityaṃ devānāṃ pataye namaḥ |
vedānāṃ pataye caiva yogināṃ pataye namaḥ || 12 ||
varadāya ca bhaktānāṃ namaḥ sarvagatāya ca || 13 ||
sraṣṭre ca pataye caiva namaśca prabhaviṣṇave || 14 ||
jagataḥ pataye caiva jagatsraṣṭre namaḥ sadā |
yaḥ stotrametadakhilaṃ paṭhate dvijanmā prātaḥ śucirniyamavānpurato dvijānām |
uvāca cedaṃ deveśaṃ sa vācā sajjamānayā || 23 ||
bhagavanyadi tuṣṭo 'si yadi deyo varaśca me |
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā tathodbhūtaṃ kumāraṃ dīptatejasam |
ayonijaḥ purā dattaḥ sa eṣa pratinandaya || 32 ||
bhūtagrāmacikitsāṃ ca mātṝṇāṃ caritaṃ ca yat |
tasyātha saptame varṣe ṛṣī divyau tapodhanau |
tamāhūya sa tuṣṭyā tu putraṃ nandinamacyutam |
tau tu tasyāśiṣaṃ devau prayuṅkto dharmanityatām |
tasya śokādvilapataḥ svaraṃ śrutvā sutaḥ śubhaḥ |
kena tvaṃ tāta duḥkhena dūyamānaḥ prarodiṣi |
duḥkhaṃ te kuta udbhūtaṃ jñātumicchāmyahaṃ pitaḥ || 53 ||
putra tvaṃ kila varṣeṇa jīvitaṃ samprahāsyasi |
tathāpi tu na mṛtyurme prabhaviṣyati mā śucaḥ || 55 ||
kiṃ tapaḥ kiṃ parijñānaṃ ko yogaḥ kaḥ śramaśca te |
na tāta tapasā mṛtyuṃ vañcayiṣye na vidyayā |
drakṣyāmi śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ tato mṛtyurna me bhavet |
naṣṭe mṛtyau tvayā sārdhaṃ ciraṃ vatsyāmi nirvṛtaḥ || 58 ||
mahādevaḥ purā dṛṣṭo labdhastvaṃ me yataḥ sutaḥ || 59 ||
na tāta tapasā devo dṛśyate na ca vidyayā |
draṣṭā tāta na saṃdeho visṛjāśu tatastu mām || 62 ||
tiṣṭhantaṃ vā śayānaṃ vā dhāvantaṃ patitaṃ tathā |
na pratīkṣati vai mṛtyuriti buddhvā śamaṃ vraja || 64 ||
avatīrya jalaṃ divyaṃ bhāvaṃ śuddhaṃ samāsthitaḥ |
na mṛtyukālā bahavaḥ kariṣyanti mama vyathām || 66 ||
abhivandya pituḥ pādau śirasā sa mahāyaśāḥ |
nirgato 'tha tato nandī jagāma saritāṃ varām |
koṭirekā yadā japtā tadā devastutoṣa ha || 3 ||
nandiṃstuṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam || 4 ||
so 'vatīrya tato bhūyaḥ prayatātmā tathaiva ha |
uktvā jagāma svaṃ veśma devyā saha mahādyutiḥ || 9 ||
sa taṃ kareṇa saṃgṛhya uddhṛtya salilācca ha |
sādhu japtaṃ tvayā dhīmanbrūhi yatte manogatam || 13 ||
japeyaṃ koṭimanyāṃ tu bhūyo 'pi tava tejasā |
varametaṃ vṛṇe deva yadi tuṣṭo 'si me vibho || 14 ||
kiṃ te japtena bhūyo 'pi tuṣṭo 'smi tava sarvathā |
yadyattvaṃ vṛṇuṣe kāmaṃ sarvaṃ tatpradadāni te || 15 ||
ādityo bhava rudro vā brūhi kiṃ vā dadāni te || 16 ||
rathine varmiṇe caiva maheṣvāsāya vai namaḥ || 24 ||
ādityānāṃ ca pataye vasūnāṃ pataye namaḥ || 26 ||
brahmaṇo gurave caiva brahmaṇo janakāya ca || 33 ||
budhyamānāya buddhāya draṣṭre vai cakṣuṣe namaḥ |
namaste sparśayitre ca tathaiva sparśanāya ca || 39 ||
namaste rasayitre ca tathaiva rasanāya ca|
namo ghrāṇāya ghrātre ca śrotre śrotrāya caiva hi |
hastine caiva hastāya tathā pādāya pādine || 40 ||
namo 'stvānandakartre ca ānandāya ca vai namaḥ |
sūkṣmāya caiva sthūlāya sattvāya rajase namaḥ |
dharmāya rucaye caiva vasiṣṭhāya namo 'stu te |
tiṣṭhate dravate caiva gāyate nṛtyate 'pi ca |
nityaṃ tvāṃ sagaṇaṃ sāmbaṃ prasannaṃ saparicchadam |
draṣṭumicchāmi deveśa eṣa me dīyatāṃ varaḥ || 51 ||
tvaṃ no gatiḥ purā deva tvaṃ caivārtāyanaṃ prabhuḥ |
śaraṇaṃ ca tvamevātha nānyaṃ paśyāmi karhicit || 52 ||
tvayā tyaktasya caivāśu vināśo nātra saṃśayaḥ |
anyāṃ gatiṃ na paśyāmi yasyā ātyantikaṃ śubham || 53 ||
anuraktaṃ ca bhaktaṃ ca tvatparaṃ tvadapāśrayam |
pratīccha māṃ sadā deva eṣa me dīyatāṃ varaḥ || 54 ||
yatra tatra mṛto vyāsa na durgatimavāpnuyāt || 57 ||
yo 'dhītya nityaṃ stavametamagryaṃ devaṃ sadābhyarcayate yatātmā |
kiṃ tasya yajñairvividhaiśca dānaistīrthaiḥ sutaptaiśca tathā tapobhiḥ || 58 ||
utthāpya nayane somaḥ aśrupūrṇe mamārja ha || 2 ||
jāne bhaktiṃ tava mayi jāne cārtiṃ tavānagha |
iṣṭo mama sadā caiva mama pārśvagataḥ sadā |
sa tayā mālayā nandī babhau kaṇṭhāvasaktayā |
uvāca brūhi kiṃ te 'dya dadāni varamuttamam || 10 ||
japyeśvara iti khyāto mama guhyo bhaviṣyati || 11 ||
siddhikṣetraṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 12 ||
śubhaṃ vāpyaśubhaṃ vātra sarvaṃ bhavitṛ tacchubham || 13 ||
jāpyaṃ mānasaṃ tulyaṃ vai rudrāṇāṃ tadbhaviṣyati |
yatra tatra mṛtā martyā yāsyanti tava lokatām || 14 ||
sā tato divyatoyā ca puṇyā maṇijalā śubhā |
tvayi snānaṃ tu yaḥ kuryācchuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ |
taṃ tathābhyarcitaṃ vyomni dṛṣṭvā meghaḥ prabhākaraḥ |
tacca pañcanadaṃ divyaṃ devaṃ japyeśvaraṃ ca tam |
brāhmaṇāṃśca tarpayitvā yatra tatra mṛto naraḥ |
mama pārśvādanapagaḥ priyaḥ saṃmata eva ca || 33 ||
japyeśvaraṃ pañcanadaṃ ca tadvai yo mānavo 'bhyetya jahāti deham |
sa me sadā syādgaṇapo variṣṭhastvayā samaḥ kāntivapuśca nityam || 34 ||
ugrasena iti khyātaḥ koṭīśatavṛtaḥ sa ca |
sa nāmnā viśruto loke grahāpyāyana ityuta |
ādityamūrdhā koṭyā ca tathā caiva dhanāvahaḥ |
amoghabhūtiḥ koṭyā ca tathā dvau meghabhūtikau || 52 ||
ete cānye ca gaṇapā guhyā ye ca mahābalāḥ |
praṇamya devaṃ devīṃ ca idaṃ vacanamabruvan || 1 ||
kimarthaṃ vayamāhūtā ājñāpaya kṛtaṃ hi tat || 2 ||
kiṃ sāgarāñchoṣayāmo yamaṃ vā saha kiṃkaraiḥ |
baddhvendraṃ saha devaiśca saviṣṇuṃ saha vāyunā |
evamukte bhagavatā gaṇapāḥ sarva eva te |
savatsāṃ surabhiṃ cāpi tasya pārśve 'tha dakṣiṇe || 16 ||
punarvasuṃ ca puṣyaṃ ca dvau matsyau varuṇālayau || 19 ||
svastikaṃ vardhamānaṃ ca śrīvatsaṃ caiva kāñcanam |
dhvajaṃ ca pūjitaṃ divyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ caivenduvarcasam || 21 ||
rājatānāṃ sahasraṃ ca pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca || 22 ||
vāsoyugaṃ vṛkṣajaṃ ca virajaḥ sūkṣmameva ca || 23 ||
kuṇḍale cāmale divye vajraṃ caiva varāyudham || 24 ||
paṭṭisaṃ ca mahaddivyaṃ śūlaṃ cāśanimeva ca |
nalabhāṃ pāriyātraṃ ca varṣaṃ kaṅkaṇimeva ca || 26 ||
lokasya mātaraścaiva pṛthivī svarga eva ca |
tīrthāni caiva sarvāṇi dānāni vividhāni ca |
jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva siṃhīṃ vyāghrīṃ tathaiva ca |
sauvarṇeṣu tu sarveṣu tīrthāni vividhāni ca |
rājateṣu ca kumbheṣu mantrāṃśchandāṃsi caiva ha |
veṣṭayitvā ca sūtreṇa devebhyaḥ pradadau vibhuḥ || 43 ||
sa jagrāha tadā brahmā ekaṃ kalaśamātmanā |
keyūre kuṇḍale caiva mukuṭaṃ hārameva ca |
paṭṭisaṃ śūlavajre ca aśanīṃ ca dadau svayam || 47 ||
gaṇānāṃ pataye caiva bhūtānāṃ pataye namaḥ |
paśūnāṃ pataye caiva jetre mṛtyostathaiva ca || 55 ||
evaṃ stutvā tato devastasmai vyāsa mahātmane |
prāñjaliḥ prayato bhūtvā jayaśabdaṃ cakāra ha || 58 ||
tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni brahmā śakrastathaiva ca || 59 ||
paṭheta satataṃ martyaḥ sa gacchenmama lokatām || 62 ||
tasya kuṣmāṇḍarājebhyo na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit || 63 ||
na bhayaṃ tatra bhavati grahebhyo vyāsa sarvadā || 64 ||
nandīśvaraṃ ye praṇamanti martyā nityaṃ prasannendriyaśuddhasattvāḥ |
te devadevasya sahādriputryā iṣṭā variṣṭhāśca gaṇā bhavanti || 65 ||
dātumarhatha tāṃ subhrūṃ snuṣāṃ mahyaṃ mahābalāḥ || 3 ||
tvayaiva deyā grāhyā ca tvaṃ no gatiranuttamā |
kaśyapaśca tathodgātā atriḥ sāma svayaṃ jagau |
viśvāvasū ruciścaiva hāhā hūhū tathaiva ca || 9 ||
urvaśī caiva rambhā ca ghṛtācī pūrvacittyapi |
tataḥ sa tu kṛtodvāho nandī gatvā mahāmanāḥ |
pādānvavande devasya devyā brahmaṇa eva ca |
śilādasya ca lokeśaḥ śriyā paramayā yutaḥ || 13 ||
varaṃ vṛṇīṣva putra tvaṃ snuṣā ceyaṃ tava priyā |
varaṃ dadāmi te vatsa anayā sahamīpsitam || 14 ||
sadā ca tuṣṭo bhava me sāmbaḥ saha gaṇeśvaraiḥ || 15 ||
pitaraṃ caiva me deva utpādakamimaṃ prabho |
pārvatyā sahito dhīmannidaṃ ca śṛṇu me vacaḥ || 17 ||
ajayyaścaiva jetā ca pūjyejyaśca sadā bhava |
ahaṃ yatra bhavāṃstatra yatra tvaṃ tatra cāpyaham || 19 ||
ayaṃ ca te pitā vipraḥ paramaiśvaryasaṃyutaḥ |
bhṛgau tasmiṃśca yaḥ prāṇāṃstyakṣyate vai sudhārmikaḥ |
varaṃ vṛṇu yatheṣṭaṃ vai tāvidaṃ pratyuvāca ha || 24 ||
yuvayorastu bhaktirme tathā bhartari caiva hi |
nityaṃ cānapagā syānme dharme ca matiruttamā |
yuṣmāsu mama bhaktiśca aiśvaryaṃ cāpi saṃmatam |
vaśyāśca yūyaṃ sarve me priyo yuṣmākameva ca || 28 ||
mahābalo mahāyogī senānīstvaṃ hi no mataḥ |
tvaṃ bhūto bhūtanetā ca nāyako 'tha vināyakaḥ || 31 ||
sa evaṃ gaṇapaiḥ sarvaiḥ stuto nandīśvaro vibhuḥ |
uvāca praṇataḥ sarvānbrūta kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ || 35 ||
ta evamuktā gaṇapāḥ sarva eva mahābalāḥ |
namo vaḥ sarvabhūtebhyo namo yogibhya eva ca |
namaḥ kāmacarebhyaśca nama ugrebhya eva ca |
namo munibhyo gāyadbhyo japadbhyaśca namo namaḥ || 45 ||
namo vaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ namo vaḥ sarvataḥ śubhāḥ || 50 ||
iti stutā gaṇapatayo mahābalāḥ śubhairvacobhiḥ suraśatrunāśanāḥ |
diśantu me sukhamatulaṃ sukhapradā balaṃ ca vīryaṃ sthiratāṃ ca saṃyuge || 52 ||
tapo 'kṣayaṃ sthānamathātulāṃ gatiṃ yaśastathāgryaṃ bahu dharmanityatām |
diśantu sarvaṃ manasepsitaṃ ca me sureśvarāḥ puṣṭimanuttamāṃ tathā || 53 ||
devāśca sarvalokāśca tato devaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ |
īpsitaṃ saha devyā vai jagāma sthānamavyayam || 57 ||
ya imaṃ nandino janma varadānaṃ tathaiva ca |
abhiṣekaṃ vivāhaṃ ca paṭhedvā śrāvayīta vā |
yo niyatastu paṭhetprayatātmā sarvamimaṃ praṇato bhavabhaktyā |
so 'pi gataḥ paralokavicārī nandisamo 'nucaro hi mama syāt || 59 ||
atha dṛṣṭvā satīṃ devīmāgatāṃ tu surūpiṇīm |
āsīnāṃ tāṃ ca sovāca menā himavataḥ priyā |
ye daridrā bhavanti sma tathaiva ca nirāśrayāḥ |
ume ta evaṃ krīḍanti yathā tava patiḥ śubhe || 8 ||
visṛṣṭā sā tadā mātrā gatvā devamuvāca ha |
dṛṣṭā ca me tatra mātā vijane lokabhāvanī || 13 ||
ume tava sadā bhartā daridrakrīḍanaiḥ śubhe |
krīḍate na hi devānāṃ krīḍā bhavati tādṛśī || 14 ||
tato devaḥ prahasyāha devīṃ hāsayituṃ prabhuḥ |
mā krudho devi mātustvaṃ tathyaṃ mātāvadattava |
sa evamukto deveśo devyā deveśvaraḥ prabhuḥ |
pārśvasthaṃ gaṇapaṃ prāha nikumbhaṃ nāma viśrutam || 20 ||
gaṇeśvara nikumbha tvaṃ gatvā vārāṇasīṃ śubhām |
śūnyāṃ kuru mahābāho upāyenaiva mā balāt || 21 ||
sa tvaṃ tathā gataḥ kuryā yathāsmai nāparādhyase |
tathā kariṣye deveśa yathā sa hi narādhipaḥ |
śūnyā vārāṇasī caiva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 25 ||
jagāma puṇyāṃ lokeṣu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ prabhuḥ || 26 ||
tatrāsau darśanaṃ svapne nāpitāya dadau gaṇaḥ |
vittaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi putrānsaubhāgyameva ca |
priyatvaṃ caiva sarvatra gatiṃ cānuttamāṃ punaḥ || 30 ||
tasya pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ prāvartayata śobhanām |
gaṇeśasya mahāsattvaḥ sa ca tāṃ pratyagṛhṇata || 34 ||
sa tasmai karmaṇā tena vittaṃ yadyatsamīhitam |
homaṃ japyaṃ tathaivānye pūjāṃ cānye varārthinaḥ |
evaṃ taṃ kāmadaṃ jñātvā divodāso nṛpastadā |
saivamuktā tadā gatvā gaṇeśaṃ prāpya śobhanā |
tāvanna bhokṣye yāvanme varo dattastvayā prabho || 42 ||
jāte ca putre dāsyāmi śatānāṃ daśatīrdaśa |
kṣīrasya pañcagavyasya kariṣye snapanaṃ ca te || 44 ||
purastādbhojayiṣye te putre jāte na saṃśayaḥ || 45 ||
sadā sattraṃ ca pūjāṃ ca kariṣyati tava prabho || 46 ||
sā tamuktvā tathā vyāsa tasthau niyamamāsthitā |
sopavāsā tadā pūjāṃ mahatīṃ tasya kurvatī || 47 ||
tāṃ tathā tiṣṭhatīṃ devaḥ provāca sa gaṇeśvaraḥ |
uttiṣṭha nāsti te putro mā khedaṃ tvaṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ || 48 ||
tato narādhipaṃ devī provāca vimanā tadā |
āryaputra na me putraṃ gaṇapo 'sau prayacchati |
bravīti nāsti te putro mā vṛthā niyamaṃ kṛthāḥ || 50 ||
evaṃ mahiṣyā sa proktaḥ svayameva narādhipaḥ |
mā sthā vṛtheha nṛpate na te putraṃ dadāmyaham || 52 ||
gaṇo vā tvaṃ piśāco vā bhūto vā rākṣaso 'pi vā |
kṛtaghnastvaṃ na saṃdeho na tvaṃ pūjāmihārhasi || 54 ||
viṣaye mama vāsī ca na ca putraṃ prayacchasi || 55 ||
sthaṇḍilaṃ ca babhañjāśu dadāhārcāṃ ca suprabhām || 57 ||
na datto yadyasau kopaḥ kastatra bhavato 'bhavat || 59 ||
rājāpi tasya vākyena tathyenārthena caiva hi |
atha sā tena śāpena purī vārāṇasī tadā |
tāṃ tu śūnyāṃ sa vijñāya devyā saha pinākadhṛk |
sa tatra mānasaṃ divyaṃ vimānaṃ sūryavarcasam |
reme navendīvaraphullanetrā devī na sasmāra vacaśca mātuḥ || 68 ||
kiṃ phalaṃ tava deveśa labhante bhaktavatsala |
bhaktā ye phalamuddiśya kurvate tava kiṃcana || 4 ||
tanme brūhi yathātattvaṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me || 9 ||
hitāya devi bhaktānāṃ pṛṣṭaste kathayāmi te || 11 ||
prāsādaṃ yastu me devi śubhraṃ kuryādanindite |
vidhānena yathoktena liṅgaṃ me sthāpayecca yaḥ |
kāñcanaṃ tuṭimātraṃ vā yo dadyādbahu vā mama |
yo me gāstu hiraṇyaṃ vā dadyādavimanāḥ priye |
vṛṣabhaṃ yaḥ prayaccheta śvetaṃ nīlamathāpi vā |
sa me puraṃ samāsādya gaṇeśaiḥ saha modate || 17 ||
rathena vṛṣayuktena mama loke sa modate || 19 ||
mahimāno pacāraiśca yo māṃ japyaiśca pūjayet |
dadāni brahmaṇo loke vāsaṃ tasya supūjitam || 20 ||
aśakto nāsti me dravyaṃ yasya nityaṃ sumadhyame || 21 ||
sa tayā śraddhayā pūto vimuktaḥ sarvapātakaiḥ |
mama lokamavāpnoti bhinne dehe na saṃśayaḥ || 22 ||
sa mitraṃ yakṣarājasya yakṣo bhavati vīryavān || 23 ||
tasmācca sarpiṣā snānaṃ bhūyaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ tathā || 26 ||
dve sahasre palānāṃ tu mahiṣākṣasya yo dahet |
devi saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ sa me nandisamo bhavet || 30 ||
dakṣiṇāyāṃ tu yo mūrtau pāyasaṃ saghṛtaṃ śubhe |
chattraṃ dadyācca yaḥ so 'pi dīpyate tejasā divi || 33 ||
dadānyasya svakaṃ lokaṃ tuṣṭo 'haṃ devi śāśvatam || 34 ||
pūjito 'haṃ sadā bhaktyā putratve kalpayāmi tam || 35 ||
ekarātraṃ ca yo martyo dīpaṃ dhārayati sthitaḥ |
ye me bhaktāḥ sadā caiva sāṃkhyayogaviśāradāḥ |
sarvaṃ paśyanti ca mayi māṃ ca sarvatra yogataḥ || 39 ||
gacchanti mama te lokaṃ tamo bhittvā sudurbhidam || 40 ||
dhyānino nityayuktāśca devi paśyanti māṃ budhāḥ || 41 ||
sarvathā vartamāno 'pi devi yo māṃ sadā smaret |
kalmaṣeṇa na yujyeta naraḥ kartā kadācana || 44 ||
yo 'bhyarcayati māṃ nityaṃ sa mamātmasamo bhavet || 45 ||
ṣaḍaṅgena ca yogena yo māmarcayata sadā |
praviśeta sa māṃ kṣipramatra nāsti vicāraṇā || 46 ||
so 'pi madgatamanā madarpaṇo yāti devi gatimapratarkitām || 47 ||
tato vyāsa punardevī patiṃ vratapatiṃ śubhā |
taccaiva phalamāpnoti yamaṃ caiva na paśyati || 5 ||
sa tapyatyā nakhāgrebhyo nityaṃ yo māṃ samāśritaḥ || 6 ||
pṛthivībhājane bhuṅkte nityaṃ parvasu yo naraḥ |
saṃvatsaraṃ tu yo bhuṅkte nityameva hyatandritaḥ |
yo bhuṅkte devi naiteṣu saṃyatastu naraḥ samām || 10 ||
bhūtānāṃ dayitaścaiva divyaṃ rūpaṃ bibharti ca || 11 ||
sa vai varṣasahasrāṇi dviṣaṣṭiṃ divi modate |
iha loke sukhī jāto māmeva pratipadyate || 18 ||
ratnāvaliṃ tu yo dadyādbrāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo 'tha viṭ |
śūdraḥ strī vā sa me loke matsaukhyaṃ prāpnute param || 19 ||
manvantaraṃ ca goloke gokanyābhiḥ sa pūjyate || 21 ||
sarve devāstathā viṣṇurbrahmā ṛṣaya eva ca |
guhyametatparaṃ devi yo vetti sa mahātapāḥ |
kṣīreṇa yo māṃ satataṃ snāpayeta trirudyataḥ |
mānasasya ca jāpyasya sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet || 25 ||
saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ kuryātkṣīreṇa snapanaṃ śuciḥ |
gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate vallabhatvaṃ ca nityaśaḥ || 26 ||
niṣkāṇāṃ ca suvarṇasya sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet || 28 ||
vitarāmi śubhaṃ lokaṃ nityaṃ tasya dhruvaṃ śivam |
liṅgapūjāṃ tu yaḥ kuryānmama devi dṛḍhavrataḥ |
arkasya karavīrasya bilvasya ca bukasya ca |
padmānāṃ tu sahasrasya mama dattasya yatphalam |
tatphalaṃ labhate pattre datte bilvasya śobhane || 34 ||
bilvapattrasahasre tu datte me yatphalaṃ smṛtam |
nirmālyaṃ yo hi me nityaṃ śirasā dhārayiṣyati |
narake sa patedghore tiryagyonau ca sambhavet || 38 ||
dīpamālāṃ tu yaḥ kuryātkārttike māsi vai mama |
gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate dīpyate ca raviryathā || 40 ||
yo me devi sadā mūrdhni sa me nandisamo bhavet || 41 ||
ye hi siddhārthakāḥ proktāstathā kṛṣṇatilāśca ye |
citro nāma gaṇo mahyaṃ tena sārdhaṃ sa modate |
sa prayāti divaṃ devi liṅgaṃ yo 'rcayatīha me || 45 ||
śṛṇu devi yathātattvaṃ yena yānti śubhāṃ gatim |
trailokye jantavaḥ sarve madbhaktā ye śubhānane || 49 ||
na ca prakāśayedguhyaṃ nāma te kīrtayennaraḥ |
yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ ca samprāpya rudraloke mahīyate || 52 ||
namo bhagavate caiva guhyāguhyāya vai sadā || 54 ||
sarvaguhyamayo mantraḥ svāhā somāya caiva ha |
puṣpāṇyetena mantreṇa yo me nityaṃ nivedayet |
sahasraṃ tena jāpyasya mānasasya kṛtaṃ bhavet || 57 ||
tilānāṃ caiva kṛṣṇānāṃ sarṣapāṇāṃ ca pārvati |
idaṃ ca vacanaṃ brūyāt sūryeti ca mameti ca |
arcayitvā ca māṃ devi brāhmaṇānna ca tarpayet |
na tatphalamavāpnoti nāhaṃ tuṣyāmi tasya vai || 60 ||
arcayitvā dvijānmāṃ ca yo me nāmāni kīrtayet |
so 'pi devi prapaśyenmāṃ viyoniṃ na sa gacchati || 61 ||
vāmadeva sudeveti hara gupteti vā punaḥ |
śarva bhīma paśupate śaṃkarogra bhaveti ca |
amāvāsyāṃ tu yo nityaṃ saghṛtaṃ guggulaṃ dahet |
idaṃ ca paramaṃ guhyaṃ yo me devi nivedayet |
imāni ca mahābhāge yo me nāmāni kīrtayet |
pūtaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam |
śrotavyaṃ na ca sarveṇa tathā deyaṃ na kasyacit || 73 ||
jagataḥ pitarau devau cakratuḥ kimataḥ param || 1 ||
tataḥ sa bhagavāndevo devīṃ himavataḥ sutām |
uvāca devi paśyāma udyānaṃ yadi rocate || 2 ||
evaṃ bhavatu deveśa yathāttha tvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja |
saha devyā tato vyāsa vārāṇasyāṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ |
asmindeśe purā devi tiṣṭhato mama śobhane || 8 ||
āśritaḥ soma āgatya saha gobhirna tāstyajat || 12 ||
sāṃnidhyaṃ kṛtavāndevi sa cāyaṃ dṛśyatāṃ sthitaḥ || 17 ||
asminnapi pradeśe tu tā gāvo brahmaṇā svayam |
brahmaṇā sa tato viṣṇuḥ proktaḥ saṃvignacetasā |
punaścāpi tato brahmā mama liṅgamimaṃ śubhe |
tasmātsvarlīna ityevaṃ guhyaṃ kṣetraṃ mama smṛtam || 29 ||
ānantyā sā gatistasya yogināṃ caiva sā smṛtā || 30 ||
utpalo vidalaścaiva yau daityau brahmaṇā purā |
strīvadhyau darpitau sṛṣṭau tvayaiva nihatau śubhe |
dṛṣṭvā tu niyato martyo dehabhede gaṇo bhavet || 36 ||
na ca muktaṃ mayā yasmādavimuktamidaṃ tataḥ |
avimukteśvaraṃ māṃ vai yo 'tra drakṣyati mānavaḥ |
gāṇapatyā gatistasya yatra tatra mṛtasya ha |
pitrā te girirājena purā himavatā svayam |
mama priyamidaṃ sthānaṃ jñātvā liṅgaṃ pratiṣṭhitam || 39 ||
saṃgame devanadyostu yaḥ snātvā manujaḥ śuciḥ |
kṣetramadhye ca yatrāhaṃ svayaṃ bhūtvā samāsthitaḥ |
dṛṣṭvedaṃ madhyameśānaṃ janma prati na śocati || 45 ||
mṛtaśca na punarjanma saṃsāre tu labhennaraḥ || 47 ||
kathitāni tava kṣetre guhyaṃ cānyadidaṃ śṛṇu || 51 ||
mama puṇyāni bhūrloke tebhyaḥ śreṣṭhatamaṃ tvidam || 55 ||
yataḥ sṛṣṭāni lokāni tataḥ kṣetramidaṃ śubham |
dṛṣṭvā na jāyate martyaḥ saṃsāre duḥkhasāgare || 59 ||
sthitānāṃ sa tathā teṣāṃ devadeva umāpatiḥ |
saṃcintya paramāṃ mūrtiṃ babhūva puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ || 65 ||
stunvantī caraṇau gatvā ka ime bhagavanniti || 71 ||
kṣetrasyāsya prabhāveṇa bhaktyā ca mama bhāvataḥ |
anugraho mayā hyevaṃ kriyate muktidaḥ sadā || 73 ||
sandhyā saptaṛcaṃ caiva sarvā nadyaḥ sarāṃsi ca |
kedāre caiva yalliṅgaṃ yacca liṅgaṃ mahālaye |
yāni cānyāni puṇyāni sthānāni mama bhūtale |
snātasya caiva gaṅgāyāṃ dṛṣṭena ca mayā śubhe |
sadya eva-m-avāpnoti kiṃ nvataḥ paramasti vai || 87 ||
sthānaṃ mamedaṃ himaśailaputri guhyaṃ sadā kṣetramidaṃ supuṇyam |
nātaḥ puṇyatamaṃ devi nāto guhyatamaṃ kvacit |
kṣetraṃ mamedaṃ surasiddhajuṣṭaṃ samprāpya martyaḥ sukṛtaprabhāvāt |
khyāto bhavetsarvasurāsurāṇāṃ mṛtaśca yāyātparamaṃ padaṃ tam || 95 ||
udyānāni tato devaḥ sthānāni ca tathātmanaḥ |
so 'paśyata tadā vipraṃ tapyamānaṃ paraṃ tapaḥ |
tamevaṃ vartamānaṃ tu bhaktyā paramayā yutam |
sa evamukto devena somaṃ dṛṣṭvā trilocanam |
namaḥ somāya hemne ca hemamālādharāya ca || 103 ||
namaḥ siddhipradātre ca siddhisiddhāya vai namaḥ || 105 ||
svayaṃmantre ca manase durvijñeyāya vai namaḥ || 107 ||
sa evaṃ stūyamānaśca bhaktyā paramayāpi ca |
yonayaḥ sapta gatvā tu yogaṃ sa samavāpsyati || 117 ||
jaigīṣavyaguhāṃ cemāṃ prāpya yo yokṣyate dvijaḥ |
māsena pūrvāṃ jātiṃ ca pūrvādhītaṃ ca vetsyati |
ekarātraṃ gatiṃ śuddhāṃ dvābhyāṃ tārayate pitṝn || 119 ||
ato bhūyaśca kiṃ te 'dya jaigīṣavya dadānyaham || 120 ||
anutsekaṃ tathā kṣāntiṃ śamaṃ damamathāpi ca || 122 ||
ete tava bhaviṣyanti ajayyatvaṃ ca yogibhiḥ |
icchato darśanaṃ caiva bhaviṣyati ca te mama || 124 ||
bho bho viśravasaḥ putra cakṣurdivyaṃ dadāni te |
somaṃ paśya mahāsattva māṃ tvaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā || 129 ||
tataḥ sa dṛṣṭvā deveśaṃ sāmbaṃ nandipurassaram |
praṇamya karṣitaḥ samyagutthātuṃ na śaśāka ha || 130 ||
uvācottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te balaṃ paurāṇamastu te || 131 ||
yā prabhoḥ sarvalokasya patnītvaṃ prajagāma ha || 134 ||
bubodha devī buddhvā ca cukopa parameśvarī || 135 ||
sā kruddhā tu kuberasya vāmamakṣi sudīptimat |
mā krudho devi yakṣasya bhaktasyāsya tapasvinaḥ |
minoti na guṇāndeva kasmānmama puraḥ sthitaḥ || 140 ||
bravīmi tvāṃ mahābhāge mā krudho jagato 'raṇi |
na doṣo 'sti na caivāsya tvayi ceto vimohitam || 144 ||
kubera yatte duritaṃ kṣāntaṃ tatte mayānagha |
vāmaṃ tathaiva bhavatu piṅgalaṃ dīptimacca ha || 148 ||
anena cāṅkito loke bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ |
tuṣṭāva devaṃ devīṃ ca śirasā prāñjalirnataḥ || 152 ||
namaḥ prakṛtaye caiva namo 'stu puruṣāya ca |
namo 'stu buddhaye caiva ahaṃkārāya vai namaḥ || 157 ||
namo 'stu rataye caiva sukhāya ca namo namaḥ |
namaḥ kīrtyai karmaṇe ca ārambhāya samāptaye || 158 ||
namo yajñāya mantrāya dakṣiṇāyai ṛce namaḥ |
namaḥ sāmne 'tha yajuṣe chandase ceṣṭaye namaḥ || 159 ||
namo 'gnaye ca vedyai ca svāhāyai haviṣe namaḥ |
namo lakṣmyai śriyai caiva namo dharmāya vedhase || 160 ||
namaḥ siddhyai tathā puṣṭyai tuṣṭyai kṣāntyai namo namaḥ || 161 ||
namaḥ svadhāyai kavyāya havyāya ca namo namaḥ |
namo vedyāya vidyāyai namaḥ śarvāya bhaktaye || 162 ||
mokṣāya muktaye caiva namaḥ kālāya mṛtyave || 163 ||
diśa no bhūtabhavyeśa yanme manasi saṃsthitam || 164 ||
ya imaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ stavaṃ prātaḥ samutthitaḥ |
japaṃśca vipro vaiśyo vā śūdraḥ kṣatriya eva vā || 165 ||
tvattaḥ prasādaḥ satataṃ bhaktiśca tvayi śāśvatī |
bhagavaṃstvāṃ ca paśyeyaṃ vara eṣo 'stu me vibho || 168 ||
ātmanā saha sakhyaṃ ca dadāvātyantikaṃ tadā || 169 ||
astraṃ ca te prayacchāmi tava nāmnā bhaviṣyati |
prakāmaṃ darśanaṃ cāsya dattvā caiva dhaneśatām |
atha devī mahābhāgā sahitā śambhunā tadā |
tvāṃ kṛtvā hṛdi tapyante vara ābhyaḥ pradīyatām || 181 ||
namaḥ siddhyai namastuṣṭyai kriyāyai buddhaye namaḥ |
namaḥ kīrtyai namaḥ satyai ulkajāyai tatheṣṭaye || 186 ||
namaḥ pṛthivyai kalyāṇyai śriyai lakṣmyai namo namaḥ |
namaḥ sudhāyai svāhāyai svadhāyai ditaye namaḥ || 187 ||
namo 'stu taḍite caiva saudāmanyai namo namaḥ |
sāvitryai cātha gāyatryai vedamātre namo namaḥ || 188 ||
namaḥ parvatavāsinyai rudrāṇyai ca namo namaḥ || 189 ||
namaḥ prakṛtaye caiva jyotsnāyai ṛddhaye namaḥ |
gatyāyai gataye caiva indrāṇyai muktaye namaḥ |
niyatyai sarite caiva gaṅgāyai sūtaye namaḥ || 191 ||
namaḥ saṃnataye caiva irāyai vṛttaye namaḥ || 192 ||
vāruṇyai ca śaraṇyāyai gauryai kālyai namo namaḥ |
kauśikyai ca namaste 'stu kātyāyanyai namo namaḥ || 193 ||
namaḥ saṃnataye caiva mahimne ca namo namaḥ |
pūjāyai te namaste 'stu śitibāhve ca sṛptaye |
saṃjñāyai ca namaste 'stu gire 'tha smṛtaye namaḥ || 195 ||
namaḥ siṃharathinyai ca śūlinyai ca namo namaḥ |
namo dhanurdharāyai ca khaḍginyai ca namo namaḥ || 198 ||
namaḥ piñcchadhvajinyai ca dhāriṇyai paṭṭisasya ca |
namo 'stu bhūtamātre ca skandasya ca namo namaḥ || 199 ||
jātyai sarvarasānāṃ ca devatāyai vanasya ca || 200 ||
āryāyai ca namo nityaṃ śikhaṇḍinyai namo namaḥ |
namo dhṛtyai namaścityai kīrtaye ca namo namaḥ || 202 ||
strīṇāṃ saubhāgyadāyinyai dhāriṇyai ca namo namaḥ |
namaḥ kriyāyai śraddhāyai medhāyai ca namo namaḥ |
namo 'stu dhāraṇāyai ca ūhāyai ca namo namaḥ || 204 ||
namaḥ samādhaye caiva spṛhāyai vittaye namaḥ || 205 ||
namaḥ prabhāyai śuddhāyai śuddhaye śucaye namaḥ || 206 ||
dīkṣāyai dakṣiṇāyai ca jvālāyai ca namo namaḥ || 207 ||
indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttyai ca nivṛttyai caiva karmaṇām |
śrutaye sarvavedānāṃ bhavānyai ca namo namaḥ || 208 ||
namaḥ śāntyai namaḥ kāntyai namaḥ patnyai harasya ca |
namaḥ śivāyai kartryai ca prabhāvāyai namo namaḥ |
mṛkaṇḍvai mārdabāhvai ca tathā surataye namaḥ || 211 ||
vinatāyai tathā lakṣmyai surasāyai namo namaḥ |
diśa naḥ sumanāḥ sarvaṃ yatkiṃciddhṛdaye sthitam || 212 ||
ya idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ naraḥ strī vā samāhitaḥ |
śayāno japate yaśca prayato vyāsa nityaśaḥ |
divākṛtaṃ sa jahyāttu mṛtaśca sugatiṃ vrajet || 214 ||
sa bhūtvānucaro devyāḥ puṇye loke mahīyate || 218 ||
tābhirevaṃ stutā devī sthitā devasya saṃnidhau |
yaccāpi parayā bhaktyā māṃ prapannāḥ stha śobhanāḥ || 220 ||
sarvaṃ dāsyāmi tadvo 'haṃ mā cirāyata ucyatām || 222 ||
devi puṃsāṃ striyaḥ sarvāḥ kāryārthaṃ viditaṃ ca te |
samāpte caiva te kārye parā iva bhavanti naḥ || 223 ||
taddevi yadi tuṣṭāsi yadi deyo varaśca naḥ |
ādau paścācca sarvābhyo hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ |
priyā eva bhaviṣyanti pāpaṃ na ca bhavetsadā || 227 ||
tataḥ sā devadevasya patnī himavataḥ sutā |
bhava nārya iti prāha hasantī priyamavyayā || 230 ||
narāḥ sarve ca yuṣmāsu bhaviṣyanti sadā ratāḥ |
vṛttiḥ śubhā bhavitrī ca sarvāsāṃ mama tejasā || 234 ||
kriyāḥ śubhāṅgasaṃskārā divyā ye mānuṣāśca ha |
evaṃ devī tadā vyāsa sṛṣṭvā tā vai visṛjya ca |
uvācāpsaraso brūta kiṃ vo bhūyaḥ karomyaham || 236 ||
tā uvāca tato devī evaṃ loke bhaviṣyatu |
tataḥ sa sahito devyā sanandī parameśvaraḥ |
kṣetrapālaḥ kathaṃ jātaḥ priyatvaṃ ca kathaṃ gataḥ |
śṛṇu vyāsa yathā lebhe gaṇeśatvaṃ sa piṅgalaḥ |
annadatvaṃ ca lokānāṃ sthānaṃ vārāṇasīṃ ca hi || 3 ||
harikeśa iti khyāto brahmaṇyo dhārmikaśca ha || 4 ||
na tvā putramahaṃ manye durjāto yastvamanyathā || 7 ||
maivaṃ kārṣīrna no vṛttirevaṃ dṛṣṭā mahātmanām |
svayambhuvā yathā sṛṣṭā saiva vṛttiḥ praśasyate || 9 ||
duṣṭā caivāpraśastā ca garhitā sādhubhiḥ sadā |
vṛttiḥ svayambhuvā sṛṣṭā tyaktavyā yadi no bhavet |
uvāca niṣkrama kṣipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ yatra rocate || 13 ||
kṣetrasya caiva māhātmyaṃ śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me |
nirjagāma ca deveśaḥ pārvatyā saha śaṃkaraḥ |
virūḍhapuṣpaiḥ paritaḥ priyaṅgubhiḥ supuṣpitaiḥ kaṇṭakitaiśca ketakaiḥ || 23 ||
udyānaṃ darśitaṃ deva śobhayā parayā yutam |
śrutvāpi na hi me tṛptirato bhūyo vadasva me || 45 ||
idaṃ guhyatamaṃ kṣetraṃ sadā vārāṇasī mama |
rocate me sadāvāso yena kāryeṇa tacchṛṇu || 49 ||
yathā mokṣamihāpnoti anyatra na tathā kvacit || 50 ||
brahmādayo vijānanti ye ca siddhā mumukṣavaḥ |
vimuktaṃ na mayā yasmānmokṣyate vā kadācana |
prayāge vā bhavenmokṣa iha vā matparigrahāt |
jaigīṣavyaḥ parāṃ siddhiṃ yo gataḥ sa mahātapāḥ |
asya kṣetrasya māhātmyādbhaktyā ca mama bhāvataḥ || 55 ||
saṃvarto bhavitā yaśca so 'pi bhaktyā mamaiva tu |
sphītāṃ janapadākīrṇāṃ bhuktvā ca suciraṃ nṛpaḥ |
iha kṣetre mṛtaḥ so 'pi saṃsāraṃ na punarviśet || 67 ||
gatā eva paraṃ mokṣaṃ prasādānmama suvrate || 69 ||
etadbudhyanti yogajñā ye ca yogīśvarā bhuvi || 72 ||
etadeva paraṃ brahma etadeva paraṃ padam || 73 ||
prayāma dātuṃ yakṣāya varaṃ bhaktāya bhāvini || 1 ||
evamuktvā tadā devaḥ saha devyā jagatpatiḥ |
taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ bhaktyā harikeśaṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ |
balaṃ dadāni te pūrvaṃ traikālyaṃ darśanaṃ tathā |
sāvarṇyaṃ ca śarīrasya paśya māṃ vigatajvaraḥ || 6 ||
tataḥ sa labdhvā tu varaṃ śarīreṇākṣatena ca |
uvāca sa tadā yakṣo varado 'smīti coditaḥ |
avimukte ca te sthāne paśyeyaṃ sarvadā yathā |
evaṃ sa bhagavānvyāsa yakṣaṃ kṛtvā gaṇeśvaram |
jagāma dhāma deveśaḥ saha tena sureśvaraḥ || 14 ||
atha dṛṣṭvā tato devīṃ devadevo vṛṣadhvajaḥ |
sabhāryaḥ sasutaścaiva sa hi māṃ sasuhṛjjanaḥ |
na raṃsye 'haṃ vinā deva tvayā sarvajagatpate || 19 ||
avimuktaṃ na moktavyaṃ kathaṃ tvaṃ yātumicchasi || 20 ||
iha caiva nivatsyāmi gamiṣyāmi ca mandaram |
aiśvaryātsarvagā hi tvaṃ yathāhaṃ devi sarvagaḥ || 22 ||
somaḥ sanandiḥ sagaṇo mandaraṃ prayayau haraḥ || 23 ||
varaṃ vṛṇu yatheṣṭaṃ tvaṃ sarvaṃ tatpradadāni te || 25 ||
punaḥ punarharaṃ dṛṣṭvā devīṃ caiva punaḥ punaḥ |
punaḥ punargaṇāṃścaiva nandinaṃ ca nanāma saḥ || 27 ||
vareṇa cchandayāmāsa bhūya eva haro girim || 28 ||
mayi te vāsamicchāmi somasya sagaṇasya ca || 29 ||
eṣa eva varo mahyaṃ dīyatāṃ bhuvaneśvara |
sanandī saha devyā ca nivatsyāmi sadā tvayi |
manasātiguṇaṃ vyāsa na tenāsti samaṃ kvacit || 34 ||
tejasā varṣmaṇā kāntyā vṛṣa nāmneti viśrutam || 35 ||
purā vedaḥ suto jajñe brahmaṇaḥ prathamo 'dbhutaḥ |
atha tuṣṭastadā devaḥ śarvo yajñasya suvrata |
uvāca varado 'smīti sa vavre varadaṃ varam || 41 ||
na ca me 'sti tathāvīryaṃ tanme yaccha namastava || 42 ||
yadā tu yajato vyāsa dakṣasya sumahātmanaḥ |
kāraṇaṃ cātra kiṃ vipra yena taṃ hatavānprabhuḥ || 48 ||
idaṃ ca śṛṇu me bhūyo vistareṇa purātanam || 49 ||
khaḍgī kirīṭamālī ca kuṇḍalī kavacī tathā |
kṣupa ityeva nāmnā taṃ brahmā svayamabhāṣata |
tataḥ syāṃ bhuvi rājāhaṃ nānyathā rocate mama || 53 ||
evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te bhava rājā prajāhitaḥ || 54 ||
sa evamuktastejasvī rājā bhuvi babhūva ha |
sa tena saha saṃgamya sukhāsīno varāsane |
cakre kathā vicitrārthāḥ prīyamāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ || 56 ||
kṣatraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ na vā śreṣṭhaṃ brahma śreṣṭhaṃ na veti ca || 57 ||
abrūtāṃ kāraṇe cobhe na vyavartata kaścana || 58 ||
svadehaṃ sa tathā śrutvā dadhīco yogamāyayā |
rāgo jātikṛto yaśca pūrvavatsa babhūva ha || 64 ||
na cārtiṃ na vyathāṃ tasya tadvajramakaronmune || 65 ||
varado 'smīti tuṣṭena viṣṇunā sa ca coditaḥ|
sakhā mama hṛṣīkeśa sa ca māmāha nityadā || 68 ||
tathāstviti ca taṃ procya dadhīcasyāśramaṃ yayau || 70 ||
uvāca na bibhemīti bhūyo bhūyo janārdanam |
nāhaṃ vakṣye bibhemīti noktaṃ nāpyucyate mayā || 75 ||
evameva hi kartavyā ye bhūtvā balavattarāḥ |
asvāmina iva premṇā bruvate durbalaṃ janam || 77 ||
kiṃ vṛthā cakramudyamya tvaṃ viṣṇo kleśamarchasi |
nāhaṃ cakrasya te gamyaḥ prasādāt tryambakasya tu || 79 ||
teṣāṃ niṣkriyatāṃ jñātvā tato dhyāsyāmi śaṃkaram || 80 ||
śaraṇaṃ taṃ prapannaśca sa dadāvabhayaṃ prabhuḥ || 81 ||
tatra viṣṇośca devasya varuṇasya ca dhīmataḥ |
tataḥ sa muṣṭimādāya kuśānāṃ cyāvaniḥ śubham |
adya garvaṃ ca darpaṃ ca balaṃ yacca tavādbhutam |
devā yuyudhire sarve viṣṇunā saha daṃśitāḥ || 89 ||
kiṃ tavānena govinda vṛthā yatnena saddvije |
kiṃ na vetsi yathā hyeṣa prasādātparameśvarāt |
na caivaṃ tvadvidhā deva brāhmaṇeṣu vikurvate |
yogena tadbalaṃ jñātvā dadhīcasya ca śaṃkarāt |
brahmāpi tamṛṣiṃ sāntvya pūjayitvā ca lokapaḥ |
bhagavanyadi tuṣṭo 'si yadi deyo varaśca me |
tasmindatte tadā tena tryambakena vare śubhe |
amanyata sthitaṃ vairaṃ kṣupeṇa saha vai ṛṣiḥ || 103 ||
uvāca varamanyacca brūhi vipra dadāni te || 104 ||
brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayitvā ca caruṃ dharmeṇa saṃyutaḥ |
ayaṃ cāpi vaṭaḥ śrīmānsthito 'haṃ yatra sāmpratam |
varaṃ dātuṃ madākhyāto nāmnā sthāṇuvaṭo mahān |
bhaviṣyati na saṃdehaḥ phalaṃ cāsyāpi me śṛṇu || 110 ||
gaṇeśvaro nandisamaḥ sa me bhavati sarvagaḥ || 114 ||
etasminneva kāle tu vyāsa dakṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ |
tvaṃ deva sarvadevānāṃ gatiśca śaraṇaṃ tathā |
tvayā vinā kathaṃ yajño vartate sarvadevapa || 5 ||
mama tvaṃ bhāvavijñānaṃ kurvatī devi bhāṣase |
na hi duḥkhaṃ piturloke kaścidicchati bhāmini || 10 ||
bhadrakālīti tāṃ prāha devīṃ devī śubhānanā || 14 ||
sa sṛṣṭaḥ praṇato bhūtvā harirnāmnā gaṇeśvaraḥ |
tataḥ sa bhagavānāha hariṃ taṃ gaṇanāyakam |
koṭyastā navatiścaiva śataṃ caiva tadā prabhoḥ |
aiśvaryeṇātha yogena yena tena puro hi vaḥ |
svāmitve ca balaṃ hetustapo vā nātra saṃśayaḥ |
asmāsvevobhayaṃ tacca svāmitvaṃ tena no varam || 28 ||
taṃ brūta yo jñāpayati vetsyāmo hi vayaṃ tataḥ || 29 ||
ūcurmantrāḥ pramāṇaṃ vo bhāgaṃ prati gaṇeśvarāḥ || 30 ||
taṃ tadā mṛgarūpeṇa dhāvantaṃ gaganaṃ prati |
evaṃ te nikṛtā vyāsa gaṇaiḥ kālyā tathaiva ca |
prasādayadhvaṃ deveśaṃ tato vo bhavitā śamaḥ || 50 ||
tvayā sṛṣṭamidaṃ viśvaṃ yajño devāśca yajñahan |
prasīda mā krudho 'smākaṃ mā naḥ kṛtvā vināśaya || 63 ||
ya imaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ niyataḥ prātarutthitaḥ |
kruddhe hi mayi yuṣmākaṃ na syājjīvaṃ kṣaṇāntare || 66 ||
nagaraṃ tasya madhye ca trikoṭīyojanaṃ śubham |
na teṣu krodho lobho vā yuddhaṃ dveṣo 'tha matsaraḥ |
na māno naiva ca stambho na doṣāstatra cāpare || 85 ||
dṛṣṭvā jagmuḥ paraṃ caiva vismayaṃ bhayameva ca || 87 ||
pañcākṣo gaṇapaḥ prāha mā bhīrbhavatu vaḥ surāḥ || 88 ||
divyaṃ dadṛśire pūrṇaṃ siṃhānāṃ tatpuraṃ mahat || 91 ||
na bhetavyaṃ surā devaṃ darśayāmyadhunā hi vaḥ |
ityuktā dadṛśuḥ śarvaṃ sahasā te sahomayā |
na caiva tatpuraṃ vyāsa na siṃhānnāpi kiṃcana || 95 ||
dṛṣṭā hi vo mama krodhāḥ siṃharūpā bhayānakāḥ |
ekena teṣāṃ raudreṇa sarve yūyaṃ vinirjitāḥ || 97 ||
iyaṃ tu devī yuṣmākaṃ kupitā parvatātmajā |
etāṃ prasādayata vai nāhaṃ kupyāmi vaḥ surāḥ || 99 ||
na śekuḥ purataḥ sthātuṃ vyāghrānmṛgagaṇā iva || 103 ||
jātāśca gaṇapāḥ sarve hantavyā na tvayeśvari || 109 ||
kālakarṇīṃ nivṛttāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā te 'pi surāstataḥ |

jayāmāhave durnirīkṣyāmacintyogradṛṣṭiṃ viśālekṣaṇāṃ pītakauśeyavastrāṃ mahāśūlaghaṇṭāpatākādhvajāṃ divyagandhājyadhūpapriyāṃ kāladaṇḍāsicarmāgrahastāṃ vapāśoṇitāntrāvasāpūrṇabhāṇḍāṃ diśāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ cārucāmīkarābaddhapaṭṭāṃ yugāntānalābhekṣaṇāmaṭṭahāsānsṛjantīṃ yathākāmakartrīmanaṅgāyudhāvikṣatāṃ śūrasenānadīṃ viśrutāṃ mandarāvāsanityāṃ diviṣṭhāṃ prapadye 'hamekānasīm || 113 ||

śubhāṃ kiṅkiṇīkāṃ prakīrṇordhvakeśīṃ pradīptāgnisandhyābhrarāgatviṣāṃ baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṃ trinetrāṃ jaṭākeśaraktāmbujābaddhamālāṃ viśalyāmanaṅgārinetrolkajāṃ hemamālāpinaddhasrajāṃ dīrghaveṇīṃ yaśaḥkīrtiyuktāṃ mayūrāṅgajābaddhacitradhvajāṃ śāntikartrīṃ prapadye 'hamekāṃ sadā || 114 ||
harasyārdhadehādhivāsāṃ prapadye mukholkodbhavāṃ devi-m-ādyāṃ parāṃ pārvatīṃ sarvavidyādhidevāṃ gatiṃ || 115 ||

nīṃ dhyāyamānāṃ dhṛtiṃ devaviprairmahāyogatarkairagamyāṃ viśiṣṭeṣṭaśiṣṭādhivāsāṃ ca lakṣmīṃ tarīṃ bhūrbhuvaḥsvarjanaḥsatyavairājamāhātmyalokāraṇīmindriyāṇāmahaṃkāratanmātrakartrīṃ tamaḥsattvarāgapravṛttiṃ parāṃ ca pravṛttiṃ maheśasya śaktiṃ tathā cetanāṃ sarvavijñānacintyāṃ prapadye 'mba devīmumāṃ mātaram || 116 ||

tathādhyāyamānāḥ sadā dāruṇaṃ cāpi sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ yattvayā tacca no nāśayāmbādya tuṣṭā yathā vai tuṣāraṃ mahāsūryadehodbhavā yacca no jātikoṭīsahasreṣu pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ yatkariṣyāma yatkurma tatsarvamevaṃ ca dadyāśca naḥ sarvamarthaṃ sakāmaṃ tathārogyamūrjāṃ śriyaṃ jñānavijñānamedhāstathā dhāraṇīṃ tarkamūhāmapohāṃ dhṛtiṃ cāryabhāvaṃ gatiṃ caiva divyāṃ tathā dharmanityatvametāṃśca ye cāpyato 'nye guṇāstāṃśca sarvāñjuṣasvādya no devi tubhyaṃ namaḥ || 117 ||
evaṃ sā saṃstutā devī devairdivyena cetasā |
gacchadhvaṃ vijvarāḥ sarve tuṣṭāhaṃ vo na saṃśayaḥ |
kopena naḥ punardevā mā vināśo hi vo bhavet || 119 ||
yajñaiścaiva yadā kṛtyaṃ tadāyaṃ bhavitā hi vaḥ |
tataḥ stotraṃ ca mantraṃ ca saṃdhānakaramavyayam |
svātmānaṃ te tadā devā hyapaśyanta maheśvare |
sa tadrūpaṃ tadā kṛtvā devānprovāca śaṃkaraḥ |
tataste devatā vyāsa sarvaṃ rudrātmakaṃ jagat |
evaṃ sa teṣāṃ deveśo darśayitvātmano balam |
yo yāṃ pūjayate mūrtiṃ bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ |
tasya tāṃ mūrtimāsthāya pūjāṃ gṛhṇāmyahaṃ surāḥ || 132 ||
na bhāgadheyaiḥ kṛtyaṃ me bhāgadheyāni vaḥ surāḥ |
evaṃ yo vetsyate martyaḥ sa lokānprāpsyate 'vyayān || 134 ||
yatra coktaṃ tvayā deva sthitena bhagavanprabho |
nātidūre tataḥ prāha tiṣṭha viṣṇo mahābala || 145 ||
sa praṇamya tataḥ pādau harasya puruṣottamaḥ |
kubjāmraka iti khyāto viṣṇoḥ kṣetraṃ samṛddhimat |
nātidūraṃ tato gatvā bhūyo devaḥ pitāmaham |
yasmāttatra haraṃ tena kurvatā vai pradakṣiṇam |
sādhayitvā caruṃ cātra bhojayitvā tathā dvijam |
sa liṅgaṃ tatra saṃsthāpya pūjāṃ kṛtvātibhāsvarām |
kartavyaṃ kiṃ mayā deva mama tadbrūhi pṛcchataḥ || 155 ||
sa evamukto devena brahmaṇā vyāsa tattvataḥ |
kṣudro 'yaṃ duṣṭacetāśca stabdho mānī ca durmatiḥ |
anujñātā mayā subhru tvamevāsya varaṃ diśa || 164 ||
ūcatuḥ paśya dakṣāvāṃ tuṣṭau divyena cakṣuṣā || 165 ||
yaste yajño gaṇairdhvastaḥ phalaṃ tasya tvamāpnuhi |
yo devastribhuvanajanmanāśakartā yaṃ mūḍhā na viduranuktamekameva |
bhaktānāmaśubhaharaṃ pinākapāṇiṃ taṃ devaṃ śaraṇagatā vayaṃ sabhāryam || 171 ||
yaḥ śāpaṃ mama ruṣito dadau sureśastaṃ devaṃ śaraṇagatā vayaṃ sabhāryam || 172 ||
bhūtānāṃ paśumṛgapakṣipannagānāṃ taṃ devaṃ śaraṇagatā vayaṃ sabhāryam || 173 ||
patnīṃ cāpyamitaguṇaprabhāvayuktāṃ taṃ devaṃ śaraṇagatā vayaṃ sabhāryam || 174 ||
indrāgryānsamunimahāyudhānvijigye taṃ devaṃ śaraṇagatā vayaṃ sabhāryam || 175 ||
yatkiṃcinmayi kaluṣaṃ kṛtaṃ ca duṣṭaṃ hyajñānādapi ca hi rāgadoṣamohāt |
tatsarvaṃ mama saha bhāryayādya śarvo viśvātmā kṣamatu mahānubhāvabhāvāt || 176 ||
tata evaṃ sa deveśaṃ stutvā sāsrāvilekṣaṇaḥ |
taṃ prapannaṃ tadā devo dakṣaṃ sāsrāvilekṣaṇam |
tāni samprati viprendra nadī tu samapadyata || 179 ||
trirātropoṣito yaśca caruṃ kṛtvā nivedya ca |
gavāṃ lokaṃ mahātejā na ca tasmātpatiṣyati || 183 ||
evaṃ sa sṛṣṭvā saritaṃ kṛtvā caivāpyanugraham |
tamāśvāsya sureśastu dakṣaṃ prāha nṛpaṃ tadā || 184 ||
gataṃ tasmādbhayaṃ te 'stu gaṇeśo me bhava priyaḥ |
brūhi kiṃ te punaḥ sādho dadāni varamīpsitam || 185 ||
bhūyo bhūyaḥ samāśvāsya nirīkṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ || 186 ||
yadi tuṣṭo 'si me deva bhavatvatra tavāvyaya |
sthānaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca vara eṣo 'stu me śiva || 187 ||
ete ca munikanye dve tapa āsthāya duṣkaram |
kaṇaiḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe khalena ca yato 'śanam |
kṛtavatyau mahābhāge tvaṃ ca dakṣa yataḥ sthitaḥ || 188 ||
nātra pāpā na ca śaṭhā nāstikā na ca māninaḥ |
lapsyante vai sadāgantuṃ na ca vastuṃ kathaṃcana |
mṛto 'tra na punarjanma lapsyate mama tejasā || 190 ||
atrābhigamya snātvā ca caruṃ kṛtvā tathaiva va |
kālīṃ cāsmai dadau prīto bhāryāṃ sarvaguṇoditām || 192 ||
evaṃ sa dakṣayajño vai vidhvasto vyāsa śambhunā |
kva vā gatā kathaṃ vāpi hyetadicchāmi veditum || 195 ||
evamastvityumā procya tāṃ devīṃ pradadau sutām |
varṣāṇāṃ tu sahasrāṇi daśa dvādaśa caiva hi |
tau tadā vīkṣya saṃmantrya smṛtvā caiva punaḥ punaḥ |
madhye maheśvaraṃ teṣāṃ menāte tejasāṃ nidhim || 6 ||
tau taṃ madhye bhavaṃ devaṃ praṇamya bahumānataḥ |
namaḥ pinākine caiva dhvajine ca namo namaḥ |
namaḥ stavyāya vai nityaṃ śatrughnāya namo namaḥ |
namo bhavāya bhavyāya bhāvanāya namo namaḥ || 14 ||
namo varāya vai nityaṃ varadāya tathaiva ca |
yo 'nena stauti vai nityaṃ niyamena samanvitaḥ |
nandinaṃ caiva devīṃ ca svayaṃ cātmānamacyutam |
yadi tuṣṭo 'si deveśa yadi deyo varaśca nau |
idaṃ ca guhyaṃ sthānaṃ nau tapasātīva bhāvitam |
idaṃ me paramaṃ guhyaṃ bhavitṛ sthānamuttamam |
gate 'tha deve sagaṇe kālena bahunā tataḥ |
tataḥ sarvaṃ dadau devo hyadṛśyatvaṃ jagāma ca || 32 ||
sapta kanyāśca tā gāvo jagaddhātryaḥ prasūyata || 34 ||
vṛṣabhaḥ sa tu saṃgatya nityaṃ prātaḥ kṛtāhnikaḥ |
pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva tathaiva ca pitāmaham |
sa cānalaḥ susaṃrabdho dattvā tasmai mahābalaḥ |
bhavāṃstvasya yato mantā kariṣye 'haṃ tato 'dya vai || 46 ||
yaste darpaśca garvaśca yadbalaṃ yacca pauruṣam |
na me tvaṃ pratimaḥ śatrurna ca vairaṃ tvayā hi me |
na tvaṃ pāsyasi rakṣiṣye sāgaraṃ mama saṃnidhau |
gale jagrāha balavānna cacāla tataḥ sa ca || 51 ||
audareṇāgninā tasya te dagdhāḥ sarva eva hi || 52 ||
visṛjyovāca gaccheti na tvāṃ hanmi vṛṣeśvara || 53 ||
tathāpyahaṃ na garjāmi garjitaiḥ kiṃ balīyasām || 54 ||
moghaṃ mama balaṃ sarvaṃ tathā caivābhigarjitam |
yathā na punarevaṃ me mānabhaṅgo bhaviṣyati || 59 ||
sa evaṃ cintayannukṣā vācaṃ śuśrāva khācchubhām |
saurabheya na bhetavyaṃ yadbravīmi kuruṣva tat || 61 ||
taṃ prapadyasva deveśaṃ tato jeṣyasi pāvakam || 62 ||
sa sraṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ na saṃśayaḥ |
sa te duḥkhamidaṃ sarvaṃ vyapaneṣyati govṛṣa || 63 ||
himavantaṃ giriṃ prāpya tatāpa vipulaṃ tapaḥ || 64 ||
tataḥ sa devaṃ saṃdṛśya sāmbaṃ sagaṇamīśvaram |
bhūyo bhūyo nirīkṣyainaṃ praṇamya ca punaḥ punaḥ |
etadicchāmi vijñātuṃ vada tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara || 76 ||
nideśe tiṣṭha caivāsya yatkartavyaṃ ca tatkuru || 79 ||
na ca māṃ sa niyuktveha yokṣyate 'nyatra karhicit || 81 ||
yadi māṃ vakṣyati punaḥ kariṣye 'haṃ tatastathā || 82 ||
ta evamuktā gacchanti yathā māṃ tvaṃ prabhāṣase || 83 ||
dūtaścāpi sa vai śreṣṭho yo bhavedarthasādhakaḥ || 84 ||
na cedvaco me kartāsi baddhvā tvāhaṃ tato 'dya vai |
gaṇapaṃ prati dudrāva tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt || 87 ||
taṃ baddhaṃ pāśavaryeṇa patitaṃ vīkṣya caiva hi |
visṛjyatāṃ suraśreṣṭha hata eṣa na saṃśayaḥ || 97 ||
putrā hyasya hatāḥ sarve suhṛdaścaiva sarvaśaḥ |
dīnasyāsya na me deva vadha iṣṭo vimucyatām || 98 ||
vegena ca diśaḥ sarvā vimānaiḥ saha bhūtapa |
yathā na kurute deva upāyaḥ saṃvidhīyatām || 105 ||
tvaṃ no gatiśca deveśa śaraṇaṃ caiva bhūtapa |
sadā bhayābhibhūtānāṃ tvaṃ trātā sarvaśaḥ prabho || 106 ||
yathā bhayaṃ na bhavati yathā svasthāśca nityaśaḥ |
lokā bhavanti sarve vai tathā hi vidadhāmi vaḥ || 107 ||
nivāsārthaṃ ca divyaṃ tamindradvīpaṃ dadāmi te |
jyotsnā bhavitrī patnī te tathā caivājarāmaraḥ |
tatastaṃ devatāḥ sarvāḥ praṇamya brahmaṇā saha |
jagmuḥ svāni kṣayāni sma devo 'pi vṛṣavānbabhau || 116 ||
mukhato 'rdhaṃ vṛṣo dharmo jaghanaṃ yajña ucyate |
rudrāḥ karṇau ca nāsāṃ ca grīvoṣṭhau hanumeva ca || 119 ||
apāne ca svayaṃ mitraḥ pucchaṃ chandāṃsi sarvaśaḥ || 120 ||
romāṇi ṛṣayaḥ sarve nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ |
iṣṭayo vedayajñāśca mantrāḥ stotrāḥ phalāni ca |
dantā marīcayaścaiva majjā auṣadhya eva ca || 124 ||
ya imaṃ saurabheyasya janma karma ca tattvataḥ |
nedaṃ śaṭhāya dātavyaṃ śrāvyaṃ vāpi kathaṃcana |
na nāstikāya duṣṭāya tathā vā pāpakarmiṇe || 132 ||
yātyambudāmbhonidhigarjitena sa vo 'stu nityaṃ sumanā maheśaḥ || 134 ||
kāraṇaṃ tatra kiṃ cāpi etadicchāmi veditum || 2 ||
atha devena tatrasthā krīḍatā sā kathāntare |
vakṣyāmi tvāṃ tyaja krodhaṃ tāmuvāca pinākadhṛk || 7 ||
tvaṃ guruḥ sarvalokasya pūjyo bhartā mamaiva ca |
yadā yadā vadasi māṃ kṛṣṇeti vadatāṃ vara |
tadā tadā me hṛdayaṃ vidīryata iva prabho || 11 ||
yadi tuṣṭo 'si me deva yadi deyo varaśca me |
tato haraḥ prahasyaināmuvāca tapasā hi kim |
tapasā kāṅkṣitaṃ yatte tadadyaiva dadāni te || 14 ||
ityuktā girijā prāha tapte tapasi puṣkale |
anujñātā satī bhaktyā cakāra triḥ pradakṣiṇam || 16 ||
anyāni ca tato 'gryāṇi vanānyāsādya sā satī || 20 ||
puṣpante ca phalante ca kāñcanāścāpare drumāḥ || 33 ||
tathā bahuvidhā anye śayyāḥ svāstaraṇā drumāḥ || 35 ||
tasyaiva ca prasādena nāsau gamyaḥ śiloccayaḥ |
tasminneva dine vyāsa śārdūlo 'pi jagāma tām || 51 ||
yādṛśaṃ tapasaścāsyā vīryaṃ manye na mānuṣī || 55 ||
tapasā kiṃ tadā vāsyā yasyā bhartā pinākadhṛk |
mahatā tejasā yuktā neyaṃ śakyā mayā śubhā |
tatsmṛtvā mātaraṃ prāha dehi mātaḥ payo mama |
tasmai piṣṭaṃ dadau mātā toyenāloḍya duḥkhitā || 66 ||
kṣīramityupanītaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā piṣṭaṃ tadā muniḥ |
ārādhaya mahādevaṃ sa te sarvaṃ pradāsyati || 68 ||
yadā caturthaṃ tatpūrṇaṃ sahasraṃ śaradāṃ mune |
tuṣṭo 'smi te varaṃ brūhi yadyadicchasi putraka || 74 ||
adya niṣkalmaṣaṃ manye tapaścīrṇaṃ mayā mahat |
kṛtameva hi tadviddhi yadi syātsukaraṃ mayā || 77 ||
bhavato me pitā vipra sakhābhūtparamaḥ purā |
tena snehena dṛṣṭvāhaṃ bhavantaṃ tapasi sthitam |
na taṃ drakṣyasi viprendra brūhi yatte manogatam || 80 ||
dharmato hi suto me tvaṃ brūhi tasmādvaraṃ varam || 81 ||
kṛtaṃ svajanakṛtyaṃ te pūjito 'smi tvayā prabho |
uvāca tapsyase paścātkiṃ te rudraḥ kariṣyati || 83 ||
gacchāmi svasti te cāstu nirvighnaste bhavatvayam |
rudraṃ prati samārambhaḥ smarethāstvaṃ hi māṃ vibho || 84 ||
gate tasmiṃstadā hīndre rudraḥ svaṃ rūpamāsthitaḥ |
brūhi niścintya manasā varaṃ yāvaddadāmi te || 86 ||
tataḥ sa dṛṣṭvā deveśaṃ śirasābhipraṇamya ca |
yadbravīmi tadīśāna mahyaṃ yaccha namo 'stu te || 88 ||
upamanyo mahāprajña sucīrṇaṃ te tapaḥ śubham |
tuṣṭo 'smi te brūhi varaṃ prayacchāmi tavānagha || 94 ||
sucīrṇaṃ me tapo deva yastvāṃ paśyāmi lokapa || 95 ||
indratvamatha somatvaṃ viṣṇutvaṃ vā dadāmi te |
brūhi kiṃ te dadānyadya visṛjasva maheśvaram |
na gṛhītaṃ prabho tena mama kiṃcinmahātmanā |
īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na svāmī tasya kaścana || 100 ||
dadāti yadi lābho me na dadāti tathāpi ca || 101 ||
bahunā kiṃ pralaptena tena dattamahaṃ vṛṇe |
narakaṃ vā paśutvaṃ vā kiṃ punaryadato 'nyathā || 102 ||
tvatto necchāmi viṣṇutvaṃ na śakratvaṃ pitāmaha |
tasya tāṃ bhāvanāṃ jñātvā pinākī sa trilocanaḥ |
uvāca putra putreti tuṣṭo 'smi tapasā tava || 109 ||
dvīpaṃ cemaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mayā sṛṣṭaṃ hi kāmagam |
bhuṅkṣva kṣīrodanaṃ vatsa bandhubhiḥ sahitaḥ sadā || 112 ||
sapta pūrvāṇi sarvāṇi kulāni tava tāpasa |
sarve bhavantu viprarṣe ya ime tava bāndhavāḥ |
sa tu taṃ varamādāya praṇamya śirasā bhavam |
namaḥ sarvārtihartre ca namaḥ śokaharāya ca || 116 ||
namo viśvāya pāśāya namo 'cintyāya caiva ha |
tvaṃ no gatiśca śreyaśca tvameva hṛdayaṃ sadā || 120 ||
jagāma bhagavānvyāsa sukeśaṃ prati sa prabhuḥ || 121 ||
sa cakārāvanataṃ harogramanyuṃ varadānena tadā vyapetamanyum || 122 ||
tataḥ sa bhagavāndevaḥ sukeśaṃ gaṇapaṃ punaḥ |
kenāsya tapasā tuṣṭo gaṇapatvaṃ dadau prabhuḥ || 2 ||
dṛṣṭvā taṃ sa tadā viprastyaktvā panthānamāśugaḥ |
narakāditi sa tvaṃ naḥ pātayiṣyasi duḥkhitān || 9 ||
na vayaṃ tapasā śakyā na yajñenāpyato 'nyathā |
na dārānāhariṣyāmi tārayiṣye ca vai pitṝn || 13 ||
tataḥ sa tāṃstadotsṛjya duḥkhena mahatā vṛtaḥ |
saṃdhāya sa mano rudre niścalaṃ susamāhitaḥ |
atha taṃ bhagavāndevo māse vartati saptame |
tuṣṭo 'smi tava bhadraṃ te tapasānena suvrata |
varaṃ varaya viprarṣe yaste manasi vartate || 20 ||
devairapi na śakyo 'sau draṣṭuṃ kimuta mānuṣaiḥ || 22 ||
śaṃkarādeva cakreśa śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham |
varaṃ kāṃkṣe na ca tvatto na cānyasmātkathaṃcana || 23 ||
bhavanto 'pi hi taṃ devaṃ yasmātsarve samāhitāḥ |
arcayadhvaṃ stuvadhvaṃ ca tasmācchreṣṭhaḥ sa ucyate || 24 ||
tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā tutoṣa bhagavānharaḥ |
uvāca cainaṃ viprendra gaṇapo me bhavākṣayaḥ || 25 ||
aiśvaryeṇa ca saṃyuktaḥ priyo mama puraḥsaraḥ || 26 ||
idaṃ ca matkṛtaṃ divyaṃ trikūṭaṃ nāma parvatam |
yeṣāṃ kṛte ca tvaṃ putra māṃ toṣayitumudyataḥ |
te ceme pitaraḥ sarve suputreṇa tvayānagha |
sukeśa iti nāmnā ca prathitastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi |
nagaśca kāmago hyeṣa labdho me tvatprasādataḥ || 34 ||
gaccha sveṣṭāṃ gatiṃ vatsa devānviprāṃśca pālaya || 37 ||
vayaṃ tu niraye ghore yātyamānāḥ sudāruṇe |
tathā nānyaṃ prapaśyāma dhanyānāṃ tvaṃ suto hi naḥ || 6 ||
pacyema ghore durvṛttā bandhuḥ syāttvaṃ na no yadi || 7 ||
bahavaḥ prāṇinaḥ putra yātyante tatra saṃyatāḥ |
pitaro noktapūrvaṃ me mṛṣā na ca vadāmi vai |
pitaraḥ karma kurvanti satāṃ yatsaṃmataṃ bhuvi |
nityaṃ cāśāsate tena prajā naḥ santu puṣkalāḥ || 11 ||
eṣa prabhāvo yuṣmākaṃ tapaḥ sucaritaṃ ca ha |
mamātra kiṃ mahāprajñā anṛtaṃ vātra kiṃ vacaḥ || 16 ||
iyaṃ ca vaidikī śubhrā śrutirvedavidāṃ varāḥ |
ātmā vai putranāmāsi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam || 18 ||
tvadanyaḥ ko vadedevaṃ yo na syādīśasaṃmataḥ |
yo na syādīdṛśaḥ putra kathaṃ taṃ sarvadevapaḥ |
tvaṃ dhātā tvaṃ hi no bandhustvaṃ janetā mahāmate |
pitā tvameva putrā hi vayaṃ tava na saṃśayaḥ || 25 ||
śrutau smṛtau ca yadgītaṃ tannaḥ saṃsmartumarhasi || 26 ||
putrā hi brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā devā yajata māmiti |
te 'yajanta tadātmānaṃ teṣāṃ brahmā cukopa ha |
te śaptāstaṃ tadā devaṃ sarva eva divaukasaḥ |
prasannaṃ taṃ samālakṣya ta ūcuḥ śirasā natāḥ |
naṣṭasaṃjñā vayaṃ deva tanno yaccha punaḥ prabho |
tatkṣamasva ca deveśa ajñānādyatkṛtaṃ hi naḥ || 29 ||
saiva saṃjñā na no deva vidyate sarvasṛkprabho |
punaḥ saṃjñāṃ ca dharmajñā mā kurudhvamato 'nyathā || 33 ||
te ca tebhyastadā putrā ācakhyuḥ prayatāḥ śubhāḥ |
putrā na yūyamasmākaṃ vayaṃ putrā hi vaḥ sutāḥ |
vadanti nānṛtaṃ devāḥ satyaṃ deveṣu vartate |
sutāścoktā hi vaḥ sarve pitaro nānṛtaṃ hi tat || 39 ||
bhaviṣyati na saṃdeho yūyaṃ putrāśca sarvaśaḥ || 40 ||
ekārthau putraśiṣyau ca tasmātputrāḥ stha sarvaśaḥ || 41 ||
tārayitvā pitṛtvaṃ ca karmaṇā tena yānti te || 42 ||
tasmādime hi pitaro yūyaṃ putrāśca sarvaśaḥ || 43 ||
abuddhvā tena devāśca taṃ hanyuḥ pāpacetasam || 48 ||
pitā tato bhavānpūjyo yo nu pāsi mahābhayāt |
putrā vayaṃ taveśāna brūhi kiṃ karavāma te || 51 ||
evametadyathoktaṃ vo nānṛtaṃ vo vacaḥ śubham |
varaṃ bhūya imaṃ mahyaṃ prayacchata gaṇeśvarāḥ |
brūhi yadviditaṃ no 'sti kathayiṣyāma taddhi te |
ato gatijñāḥ sarveṣāṃ narakānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 57 ||
teṣāṃ satattvaṃ yogaṃ ca kālabhedaṃ tathā kramam |
tatsarvaṃ śrotumicchāmi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me || 58 ||
kiṃrūpāḥ ke ca yātyante kathaṃ caiva suduḥkhitāḥ || 59 ||
kathaṃ ca patate janturyātyate ca kathaṃ tathā |
kathayadhvaṃ mahāprajñāḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me || 61 ||
ayaṃ te janakaḥ putra suśarmā lokaviśrutaḥ |
teṣāṃ satataduḥkhaṃ tu nṝṇāṃ pāpena karmaṇā |
pramāṇaṃ tu gaṇeśeśa na śakyaṃ vaktumekaśaḥ |
patito narake ghore duṣkṛtī svena karmaṇā |
evaṃ sarvā diśo gatvā hyantamaprāpya duḥkhitāḥ |
yātyante karuṇaṃ tatra pāpasyānte tataḥ punaḥ || 16 ||
yena kālena tu punarjantuḥ patati duḥkhitaḥ |
vyādhyādhiyuktaḥ kleśena tyajati svāṃ tanuṃ tataḥ || 20 ||
sa tatra patito bhūyo yātyamānaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ |
śītena vāyunā spṛṣṭaḥ sukhaṃ tatra sa vindati || 33 ||
sa taṃ viśrāmamāsādya vismṛto yātanāṃ tadā |
sa tena kṛṣyamāṇaśca bhūyo duḥkhena cārditaḥ|
tato bhūyaḥ samākṛṣya yātanāyāṃ sa rākṣasaḥ |
tatra varṣasahasraṃ vai yātitaḥ punareva saḥ |
evaṃ sa ucchrayānprāpya aṣṭau pāpena karmaṇā |
ye tu gacchanti taṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ puruṣādhamāḥ |
prathamo yo mayā prokto narako yamalācalaḥ |
ākāśe cāpi lohena tau jālena samāvṛtau || 44 ||
yātyante tatra puruṣā ye vai striyamanicchatīm |
ākramanti parākyāṃ vai kanyādūṣaka eva ca || 45 ||
vṛthāmāṃsāśino ye ca viṣaṃ ye ca prakurvate |
yamaleṣu ca jāteṣu yo na kuryānnarādhamaḥ |
tatra vyāghraiśca siṃhaiśca śarabhaiḥ sa tarakṣubhiḥ |
śṛṇuyādya abhīkṣṇaśo 'tivegaṃ sa na yāti tamugrapāpayogam || 59 ||
garteṣu patitaṃ caiva rākṣasāḥ prāpya sarvaśaḥ |
agnido garadātā ca ayonau yaśca gacchati |
ghaṇṭiko grāmayājī ca śūdrādhyāpaka eva ca || 17 ||
tathā vārdhuṣiko lubdho vikretā brahmaṇaśca yaḥ |
koṭīdvayena tūttīrṇā varṣāṇāṃ vai punaśca te |
ucchraye pātitāḥ stokaṃ kālaṃ viśrāmya vai punaḥ || 19 ||
śṛṇuyātprayataḥ kutūhalātmā na sa gacchennirayaṃ hi śālmalam || 21 ||
socchrayāścaiva vijñeyā na vakṣye tadahaṃ punaḥ || 2 ||
ye haranti striyaṃ vājivikretā yastathā gavām || 3 ||
guruṃ nindati yaścāpi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ tathā |
āśramāṇāṃ tathā bhettā rahasyānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ |
adattaṃ yaḥ samādadyātsa gaccheddvija tatra vai || 6 ||
te tatra patitā ghore narake pāpacetasaḥ |
tisraḥ koṭyastu saṃpūrṇā varṣāṇāṃ tu narādhamāḥ |
kālasūtreṇa mahatā mitvā mitvā tu duṣkṛtam |
viśrāmya sa tadā jantuḥ pātyate narake punaḥ |
na sa yāti tamugraduḥkhasūtraṃ narakaṃ yamalokakālasūtram || 10 ||
tau vināśayate yaśca agnido yo gṛheṣu ca || 5 ||
ya imaṃ bahuduṣkṛtāntapākaṃ śṛṇuyānmanujo hi karmavāsam |
na sa gacchati taṃ durātmatāpaṃ narakaṃ kumbhisamākhyamujjhitāghaḥ || 10 ||
āyasebhyo viśiṣṭāni na ca tānyāyasāni hi || 3 ||
pātyante vivaśā mūḍhā yāvatpāpaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam || 9 ||
ye tu taṃ narakaṃ ghoraṃ narā gacchanti pāpinaḥ |
ārāme vātha grāme vā vikrīṇati ca durmatiḥ || 11 ||
niṣpāditaṃ tathā vṛkṣamāśrame pathi vā punaḥ |
yatra vā tatra vā jātaṃ yo nāśayati durmatiḥ || 13 ||
vināśayati yo mūḍhaḥ sa ca taṃ pratipadyate || 14 ||
yaścāpaharate mūḍhaḥ puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca |
vināśayedvā taṃ vṛkṣaṃ sa ca taṃ pratipadyate || 16 ||
sarve te taṃ prapadyante socchrayaṃ narakaṃ mahat |
uttīrṇāśca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsāraṃ yānti te 'śubhāḥ || 18 ||
na sa taṃ samupaiti puṇyakarmā viditātmā hyasipatranāmadheyam || 19 ||
tatra te patitā vatsa tantukaiḥ śaivalena ca |
tato muktāstūcchrayeṣu pātyante vai punaḥ punaḥ || 8 ||
pātyante vivaśā mūḍhā yāvatpāpaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam || 9 ||
sahasraṃ vardhate putra varṣāṇāṃ vai samāsataḥ || 11 ||
ye tu gacchanti taṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ duṣṭacetasaḥ |
yaśca nagnaḥ praviśati striyaṃ yaścātra gacchati |
tathā puṣkariṇīnāṃ ca dūṣako yaśca mānavaḥ |
pathistho vā gṛhe vāpi sārthānāṃ vā bhayaṃkaraḥ |
te sarve narakaṃ ghoraṃ prapadyante narādhamāḥ || 16 ||
prayataḥ sa na yāti bhāvanīṃ saritaṃ vaitaraṇīmasaṅginīm || 17 ||
yatra te puruṣā ghorā yamābhā yamakiṃkarāḥ |
ucchrayeṣu tathā ghorāṃ yātanāṃ prāpnuvanti te || 5 ||
ete ye yānti puruṣāḥ socchrayaṃ narakaṃ mahat |
tathā pravrajitaṃ caiva agniṃ vāpyatha laṅghayet || 7 ||
striyaṃ vātha pumāṃsaṃ vā klībaṃ vānyaṃ narādhamaḥ || 8 ||
bhāryā patiṃ vā putraṃ vā teṣāṃ sā gatirucyate || 10 ||
vidyāḥ śāstrāṇi divyāni teṣāṃ sā gatirucyate || 11 ||
praṇataḥ sa na yāti taṃ bhayānakaṃ narakaṃ durgamayoghanāvatānam || 12 ||
taṃ te gatvā pragṛhṇanti so 'pyagnimati dāruṇaḥ || 3 ||
narāstaṃ yānti niḥsaṅgaṃ ye tānme tvaṃ niśāmaya || 4 ||
gurubhāryāṃ ca yo gacchedgurusvaṃ vā hareta yaḥ |
sa na yāti tamugraśokapadmaṃ narakaṃ mṛtyumivāti kālasadmam || 11 ||
yatra te kiṃkarā ghorā yamasya yamasaṃnibhāḥ || 1 ||
utkṛtyotkṛtya māṃsāni tebhyo yacchanti vai punaḥ || 2 ||
tānāśrayanti duḥkhārtā agniṃ varṣanti te 'pi ca || 6 ||
śilāśca bahvyastatrānyāstāḥ śliṣyanti yadā ca te |
suvarṇahārī yaścaiva mātṛyāyī ca yo naraḥ |
matsarī yaśca durvṛttaḥ śravaṇānāṃ ca pūjakaḥ |
vṛṣalo yaḥ śrutiṃ brūyācchṛṇuyādapi vā punaḥ |
sa tu daivavidhipraveritātmā divamevaiti na yāti taṃ kadācit || 15 ||
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi rauravaṃ narakaṃ punaḥ |
yatra te vivaśā baddhāḥ karmaṇā svena jantavaḥ |
ru iti procyate śabdastatrāsau śrūyate yataḥ |
punaḥ punarvā bhīmo hi rauravastena kīrtyate || 2 ||
taṃ hi gacchanti puruṣāḥ surāpā dharmadeśakāḥ |
pitṛhā mātṛhā caiva bhrātṛhā guruhā tathā || 8 ||
ya imaṃ śṛṇuyācca rauravaṃ narakaṃ pāpakṛtāṃ surauravam |
niyataṃ prayato 'tirauravaṃ na sa gacchenmanasāpi rauravam || 11 ||
yatra dhārāśca toyasya taḍāgāni ca putraka |
tataḥ sa tena dāhena duḥkhitaḥ paramārtimān |
āśāṃ dattvā na dadyādyo yaśca tīrthāvadūṣakaḥ || 10 ||
agnau gavi ca yo dānaṃ brāhmaṇe vāpi vārayet || 11 ||
kapilā yasya gauḥ syācca anagnerbrāhmaṇasya ha |
rāṣṭralopaṃ dāralopaṃ dhanalopaṃ ca yo naraḥ |
deśasya ḍāmaraṃ caiva satataṃ ya ihecchati || 15 ||
ya imaṃ śṛṇuyādabhīkṣṇaśo niyataṃ dharmamatiśca tiṣṭhati |
na sa gacchati taṃ bhayāvahaṃ narakaṃ rauravamugrarauravam || 16 ||
brahmahā bhrūṇahā caiva surāpo brāhmaṇaśca yaḥ |
vighnaṃ karoti mohāndha āhūya ca kṛśaṃ tathā |
brāhmaṇaṃ na dadātyasya arthinaṃ yaśca dūṣayet || 9 ||
śāstrāṇi harate yaśca goghno yaśca naraḥ smṛtaḥ |
nāstikāśca durātmāna ityete taṃ prayānti vai || 10 ||
na sa yāti tamomayaṃ sadā narakaṃ dāruṇajantuśokadam || 11 ||
tamastamataraṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ śṛṇu me punaḥ |
prakāśo yatra naivāsti naiva dṛṣṭiḥ pravartate || 1 ||
tatrāsau patito mūḍho vahninā dahyate bhṛśam |
upadeśaṃ ca yo dveṣādācāryo na prayacchati |
sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ dustaraṃ taṃ tamomayam || 9 ||
kṛtaghnaṃ tu samādāya narakāḥ sarva eva te |
upāyamanyaṃ paśyasva prasādaṃ kuru naḥ prabho || 11 ||
tataste ṛṣayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā dīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā |
yamaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhamidaṃ vai bruvate vacaḥ || 14 ||
brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā |
śodhayiṣyatha gacchadhvaṃ naikā hyasya gatiḥ smṛtā || 16 ||
tasmādgṛhītvā vidyāṃ ca dakṣiṇāṃ yo na yacchati || 18 ||
puṣṭaśca yaḥ svaṃ nānveti yaśca taṃ ghātayennaraḥ |
kṛtasya doṣaṃ vadati sakāmaṃ na karoti ca |
na smarecca kṛtaṃ yastu āśramānyaśca dūṣayet || 19 ||
bhāryākarmakarīṇāṃ ca narmāṇi vadate ca yaḥ || 20 ||
na dattaṃ na hutaṃ kiṃ cidamuṣminniti yo vadet |
yasteṣāṃ doṣavaktā ca abhyasūyaka eva ca |
kṛtopakāriṇe pūrvaṃ na karoti priyaṃ ca yaḥ || 25 ||
ete sarve narā duṣṭāḥ sarva evāśubhe ratāḥ |
ya imaṃ tāmasaṃ ghoraṃ śṛṇuyādvā paṭheta vā |
prathame narake proktā ye mayā pāpakarmiṇaḥ |
śeṣeṇa karmaṇā te tu jāyante kṛmiyoniṣu || 2 ||
tatra tāvatparāvṛttā jāyante goṣu te yadā |
tatra te kurvate bhūyo yadi kiṃcinna kilbiṣam |
tato viśuddhāṃ jātiṃ te punareva labhantyuta |
na ca bhūyo 'pi te ghoraṃ saṃsāraṃ prāpnuvanti vai || 5 ||
dvitīye ye mayā proktāste muktāḥ śeṣakarmaṇā |
tathā śatasahasraṃ ca śatānāṃ te punargatāḥ |
tṛtīye tvatha ye proktā mayā duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ |
tataḥ siṃhāśca sarpāśca gāvaḥ paścācca mānuṣāḥ || 10 ||
caturthe tvatha ye proktā mayā duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ |
yonīnāṃ hi tato bhūyo jāyante te tato mṛgāḥ || 12 ||
pañcame ye mayā proktāste 'pi śeṣeṇa karmaṇā |
hastiyonau ca tāvaddhi uṣṭreṣvaśveṣu caiva hi |
tato gotvaṃ samāsādya mānuṣyaṃ prāpnuvanti te || 15 ||
koṭimekāṃ tato yūkā tato matso 'tha sūkaraḥ |
tato latā tato gulmastato hastī ca jāyate |
jāyate kṛmikīṭeṣu dve koṭī dviguṇe ca saḥ || 20 ||
tāvadeva ca kākastu jīvaṃjīvaka eva ca || 26 ||
tataḥ śvā gardabhaścaiva bhaināśī śuka eva ca |
tato bhavati gauścāpi tataḥ ṣaṇḍhaḥ prajāyate || 29 ||
tataḥ śvā jāyate bhūyaścakrāhvaśca punaḥ punaḥ |
jāyate kiṃnaraścāpi dvīpī śarabha eva ca |
tato bhavati kākaśca bhāsaścaiva sa jāyate |
vāntāśī ca tataḥ pakṣī ulūkaśca tataḥ punaḥ || 34 ||
punarvṛkṣaśca gulmaśca tato bhavati vai mṛgaḥ |
tato gaurmanujaścāpi tatra garbhe sa vai mṛtaḥ || 35 ||
punaḥ punarjāyamānaḥ sahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ sa tu |
vyādhitaḥ kutsitaścaiva jāyate sa naraḥ punaḥ || 36 ||
tatrāpi kutsitāṃ yoniṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ prapadyate || 38 ||
ya imaṃ śṛṇuyādyuktaḥ sadā parvasu parvasu |
śrāvyaṃ ca paṭhitavyaṃ ca satataṃ bhūtimicchatā || 42 ||
idaṃ tu sarvārthasukhāvahaṃ dhruvaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ sugatipradaṃ śubham |
sadaiva vipreṇa samāhitātmanā adhītya dhāryaṃ śrutisaṃmitaṃ dhruvaṃ || 43 ||
sukeśastu tato vyāsa pituḥ śrutvā sudīnavān |
īśvarasya sataḥ putra nedaṃ tava vidhīyate || 4 ||
anādṛtya kṣayaṃ putra mokṣasteṣāṃ na vidyate |
karmaṇaḥ svakṛtasyeha sa ca bhogātkṣayo mataḥ || 6 ||
na ca te narakāḥ śakyā hartuṃ karmakṣayaṃ vinā || 7 ||
aśakyāḥ khalu ye hyarthā na tānprājñaḥ samārabhet |
uvāca praṇato bhūtvā māvamaṃsthāḥ sutaṃ hi mām || 9 ||
yūyaṃ yathaiva tīrṇāḥ stha narakasthā vicetasaḥ |
tathā te jantavaḥ sarve tariṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ || 11 ||
yāvadevaṃ na dahati yāvaccaiva na kupyate |
uvāca mā bhayaṃ vo 'stu nāyaṃ kaścidasaṃmataḥ || 17 ||
te yūyaṃ yadi manyadhvaṃ gatvā rudraṃ praṇamya ca |
evamastviti te sarve brahmaṇā saha saṃgatāḥ |
tasya kāmaṃ sakāmaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva bhuvaneśvara || 22 ||
sarvaṃ tatsaṃpradāsyāmi tvaṃ hi nandisamo mama || 26 ||
tataḥ sukeśa utthāya stutvā taṃ vṛṣabhadhvajam |
te yathā pratimucyante sarva eva jagatpate |
tathā kuru mamādyaiva vara eṣo mayārthitaḥ || 29 ||
ye cādhunā narā deva yātyante narakeṣu vai |
evaṃ bhavatu te vatsa muktā nārakiṇo narāḥ || 31 ||
anayāpi ca bhaktyā tvaṃ kāruṇyena ca vallabhaḥ |
yo hi tārayate jantūnāpadaṃ kiṃcideva hi |
tasya dharmo 'mito bhūtvā saṃsāraṃ na prayacchati || 34 ||
sa tvaṃ pareṇa yogena aiśvaryeṇa ca saṃyutaḥ |
jantūnāṃ tāraṇe yuktastvayānyaḥ kaḥ samo bhuvi || 37 ||
na cānyadasti kartavyaṃ kṛtyaṃ yanme manogatam |
śāntaṃ ca jagato duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā jagmuryathāgatam || 41 ||
ya imaṃ nārakottāraṃ śṛṇuyādvā paṭheta vā |
ke punastaṃ na gacchanti narakaṃ śubhakarmiṇaḥ |
tathā strīṇāṃ ca kā yuktā gatiḥ paramikā śubhā |
na gacchanti narā ye tu narakaṃ taṃ suduḥkhitāḥ |
nāgnicinnarakaṃ yāti na satputrī na govratī |
nāśvamedhena yo yaṣṭā gosahasraprado na ca || 4 ||
na ca svādhyāyanityo yo rudrajāpī ca yo naraḥ|
tathā gāṃ caiva saṃbhagnāṃ patitāṃ śaktivarjitām |
saṃrakṣati suyuktātmā sa ca taṃ naiva gacchati || 7 ||
maheśaṃ yaśca bhāvena pareṇa ca samādhinā |
bhaktaḥ samarcayennityaṃ sa ca taṃ naiva gacchati || 8 ||
kṣatriyā ye ca rakṣārthaṃ prajānāṃ nityamudyatāḥ |
narakaṃ te na paśyanti svargagāste prakīrtitāḥ || 12 ||
bhaktā varṇatrayaṃ ye ca śūdrā darpavivarjitāḥ |
na te paśyanti narakānsugatiṃ ca mṛtā yayuḥ || 13 ||
caturṣvapi ca varṇeṣu manujā bhāvataḥ śivam |
na te prayānti narakānprāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim || 14 ||
prāsādaṃ ye ca vai kṛtvā devadevamupāsate |
ropitāni ca ṣaṇḍāni te 'pi tāni na yānti hi || 16 ||
nityaṃ prakurvate ye ca te 'pi tānna vrajanti hi || 17 ||
dhyānī tu sarvadā yo vai gaṇāñjapati vā śuciḥ |
yogī tu sarvapāpāni kurvannapi na lipyate || 20 ||
strīṇāṃ tu paramo devaḥ patirbhavati sarvadā |
karmaṇā manasā vācā yaddadāti juhoti vā |
parityajya patiṃ nārī na tasya phalamaśnute || 22 ||
patau mṛte 'pi manasā nānyamicchati yā naram || 23 ||
karoti puṇyaṃ yaccāpi patyuḥ sarvaṃ prayacchati |
saṃsāraṃ naiva sā ghoraṃ sarvaṃ saṃpratipadyate |
anyāsāṃ tu na saṃdeho narakaṃ prati suvrata || 25 ||
kiyatā caiva kālena varaṃ lebhe maheśvarāt || 27 ||
kasya putraḥ kasya naptā kiṃnāmā sa ca sattamaḥ |
gautamasyānvaye vipro nāmnā kṛṣṇa iti prabhuḥ |
jarāpariṇataścāhaṃ na ca me dṛśyate sutaḥ || 31 ||
sā tvaṃ kaṃcitsagotraṃ me anujñātā mayā śubhe |
na mayā śrutametatte tathā noktaṃ tvayānagha |
atrīṇāṃ tu kule jātā gautamaṃ kulamāgatā |
putrānkulaṃ ca lokāṃśca tapaḥ kuru mahāmune || 35 ||
tapasā hi suto labdhaḥ śaktinā sa parāśaraḥ |
māṃ hi dṛṣṭvā purā prāha atrirbrahmasutaḥ svayam |
tapasā hi suto labdhaḥ śaktinā sa parāśaraḥ |
tena svena ca saṃyukto rudramārādhaya prabho || 40 ||
evamuktaḥ sa tejasvī hriyā paramayā yutaḥ |
tataḥ sa duḥkhito bhūyaḥ prāṇāyāmena tasthivān || 43 ||
kimevaṃ kliśyase vipra na tavāsti sutaḥ kvacit |
cintayāmāsa maraṇaṃ na gantuṃ svaṃ gṛhaṃ prati || 45 ||
sa kāṣṭhakūṭaṃ saṃbhṛtya gṛhītvāgniṃ ca duḥkhitaḥ |
putraste bhavitā gaccha mā ca tvaṃ sāhasaṃ kṛthāḥ |
kāṣṭhakūṭeti nāmnā ca bhaviṣyati sa te sutaḥ || 48 ||
atha hṛṣṭamanā vipro gatvā patnyāṃ mahātapāḥ |
sa gatvā mātaraṃ vipraḥ pitaraṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ |
āvāṃ tārayitā cāyaṃ tathaiva ca pitāmahān |
pitṝṇāṃ cānṛṇau syāva ityabhīṣṭo 'smi vāṃ sutaḥ || 53 ||
na ca nākhyeyametadvāṃ mayā cintā kṛtā śubham |
aśubhaṃ vāpi yatkiṃcidyuvāṃ mama gatiḥ parā || 59 ||
aihikī cāṅgaśuśrūṣā paratre yā ca dharmadā |
tatraihikaṃ na no hīṣṭaṃ yathā hyāmuṣmikaṃ kṛtam || 62 ||
gacchādhīṣva śrutiṃ caiva smṛtiṃ caiva sukarmaṇām || 63 ||
yathā te 'yaṃ pitā putra bravīti viditātmavān |
tathā kuru yathā devo varadaste bhavedbhavaḥ || 64 ||
yathā tuṣṭau tvayā putra jīvau jīvena saṃgatau |
sa jagāma tadā tābhyāṃ visṛṣṭaścyavanaṃ prati |
sa tamāsādya tuṣṭena tenāsau saphalaḥ kṛtaḥ |
mā śoke mana ādhatsva eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ || 74 ||
devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca yogināṃ ca mahātmanām |
ahaṃ tenātmanātmā vai sṛṣṭaḥ svenaiva tejasā |
paśya māṃ kṛtakṛtyaṃ tvaṃ gāyatrīvātmanaḥ sutam || 76 ||
tathopavedāḥ sarve ca adhyātmaṃ caiva kṛtsnaśaḥ || 77 ||
māṃ pālaya mahāsattve gāyatrīva sadā kratum || 79 ||
śrutvā tasya vacastadvai mātā tathyaṃ mahātmanaḥ|
