putra naitaddhi duḥkhaṃ me mṛtaḥ sa iti saṃmataḥ |
ātmānaṃ putra śocāmi yāhaṃ tena vinā kṛtā |
nārthā na bhogasvajanā na putrā naiva bāndhavāḥ |
patiryadi tataḥ sarvaṃ nāsti kiṃcitpatiṃ vinā |
sarvaṃ hi duḥkhadaṃ tāsāṃ yāsāṃ nāsti patiḥ suta || 85 ||
idaṃ ca me punarduḥkhaṃ yattvāṃ tena sahādya vai |
bahuśaḥ sa hi māmāha kāṣṭhakūṭa iheṣyati |
kadā drakṣyāmi taṃ putraṃ sapatnīkaṃ dṛḍhavratam |
mayā tvamuktaḥ pūrvaṃ ca gacchanvai tasya sannidhau |
yā tvāṃ paśyāmi putreha vinā tenāsatī punaḥ || 93 ||
tataḥ sā kurarī yadvadvinā patyā mahāyaśā |
hā tāta mama durbuddheradharmajñasya caiva hi |
kva gato 'si na me 'dya tvaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃprabhāṣase || 96 ||
nanu te tapasā labdhaḥ pareṇa ca samādhinā |
arājakamidaṃ manye pitṛghnaṃ māṃ na hanti yat || 100 ||
imāṃ pratijñāṃ cakre sa ṛṣimadhye mahātapāḥ |
vāyavo me śarīrasthā na cariṣyanti karhicit || 103 ||
rudraṃ draṣṭāsmi yāvacca yāvacca pitaraṃ tathā |
brūhi putra varaṃ cāpi yaste hṛdi samāhitaḥ |
bhagavanmṛtyunā mātā pitā ca mama yojitau |
tau mṛtau narakaṃ ghoraṃ prapannau mṛtyunārditau |
na tau śakyau punarjīvau kartumanyadvṛṇīṣva me || 112 ||
tayorna cāsti vai deho na cānyatkāraṇaṃ tathā || 114 ||
tubhyaṃ vai nāstyakartavyaṃ kartavyaṃ cenmataṃ bhavet |
śarīraṃ ca vinā dṛṣṭamutthānaṃ vai dhruvasya tu || 116 ||
na cāpi me śarīreṇa vinā tābhyāṃ ratiḥ prabho |
tasmādyacchasva deveśa na me kāryamanena hi || 118 ||
parīkṣeyaṃ kṛtā putra tava dharmabhṛtāṃ vara |
aiśvaryeṇa ca saṃyuktaḥ priyo me gaṇapo bhavān || 121 ||
aiśvaryeṇa ca tulyāste bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ || 124 ||
ayaṃ ca te pitā putra bhūmanyuḥ saha bhāryayā |
tāvaddeva idaṃ sarvaṃ cakāra kathitaṃ hi yat || 128 ||
paṭhate 'tiguṇaprasādhanaṃ sa mṛto yāti na dīnasaṃbhavam || 131 ||
śṛṇu kāle vyatīte hi tapo devyāḥ suduścaram |
na cāsyā glānirabhavanna balakṣaya eva vā |
jyotīṃṣi timirāṇyāsanvyomni siddhā na yānti ca || 9 ||
svarge 'pi na sukhaṃ teṣāmautsukyaṃ cāpi jāyate || 10 ||
tato devāḥ samāgamya ūcuḥ sarve parasparam |
loko 'yaṃ viparīto 'dya kimarthaṃ śaṃsa naḥ prabho || 17 ||
adya varṣasahasraṃ hi divyaṃ tasyāḥ samādhinā |
varṣāṇāṃ dve śate caiva tathānyaccharadāṃ śatam || 20 ||
sā hi devī tapoyuktā ato bhūyo vibhāvarī |
tathā kuru yathā sādhvī vinivartati śobhanā || 24 ||
āruroha vimānaṃ taṃ brahmā sa munibhiḥ saha |
vedaiḥ saha tathā cāpi mantraiḥ sarvaistathaiva ca || 33 ||
tasya pārśve tu sāvitrī gāyatrī caiva suprabhā |
ete caiva yathoddiṣṭāḥ sāgarā diśa eva ca |
akṣasūtraṃ ca yogaṃ ca japyaṃ caivāgrataḥ sthitāḥ |
dayā kṛpātha dānaṃ ca śraddhā caiva hriyā saha |
evaṃ teṣu vimānaṃ taṃ samārūḍheṣu sarvaśaḥ |
yayau prabhāvena manonugāminā yathā manaḥ sarvasṛjeva hetunā || 48 ||
idaṃ praviśya dharmātmā duḥkhaṃ bhūyo na vindate |
na cāpi janma prāpnoti nityamaiśvaryago hi saḥ || 6 ||
vardhate giriṇā sārdhaṃ vindhyasya śikharaṃ yathā || 8 ||
etadandhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtvā megho 'sau jīvanaḥ svayam |
tuṣṭāva ca tadā devaṃ śarvamugraṃ kapardinam |
te caiva ṛṣayaḥ sarve vimānasthāḥ susaṃyatāḥ || 12 ||
yūyaṃ jñātā bhagavatā yena kāryeṇa cāgatāḥ |
kurudhvaṃ kila tacchīghraṃ kālo 'yaṃ tasya vartate || 17 ||
tataḥ sa kṛtvā manasā namaskāraṃ hi śambhave |
atra sā jagato dhātrī dhātrī putramivaurasam |
aho nu śikharaṃ puṇyaṃ bhāgyavaccāpi sarvathā |
paśyadhvaṃ tapaso vīryaṃ devyāḥ sucaritasya vai |
aśakto na mahādevo varaṃ dātuṃ mahāmanāḥ |
ya evaṃ cintayeddevaṃ na bhavetsa kathaṃcana || 33 ||
sā tamarghyeṇa pādyena madhuparkeṇa caiva ha |
sṛṣṭāḥ sma varade devi mā naḥ kṛtvā vināśaya || 5 ||
kiṃ vā te hṛdaye devi yadyapi syātsuduṣkaram |
ayaṃ bhakto 'nuraktaśca mama nityaṃ priyaḥ prabho || 8 ||
vyāghrasya tāvadyacchasva tato dāsyasi me varam |
asmai datsva varaṃ deva nāsmi tāvadvarārthinī || 10 ||
nāsya śuddhaṃ mano devi krūro 'yaṃ pāpacetanaḥ |
atha sā tadvacaḥ śrutvā rudrāṇī lokabhāvanī |
bhagavanko hi lokeṣu tiryaktve sati niścalaḥ |
tasmādāryāḥ sadā sevyā nityaṃ pāpakṛtāpi hi |
ato 'smai brūhi deveśe varo yastava rocate || 20 ||
tvayā mayā ca yadyasya kṛteyaṃ nandirīdṛśī |
gaurīti loke khyātā ca bhaveyaṃ kamalodbhava || 26 ||
anyaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te varaṃ yatpradadāni te || 27 ||
jetā hantā tathādeṣṭā ajaro 'vadhya eva ca |
ya imaṃ paṭhate sadā vipaścitpuruṣaḥ prātaratandrito hi kaścit |
kurute nabhayaṃ hi somanandī varadastasya haraśca somanandī || 37 ||
duṣkṛtaṃ karma kṛtvā tu narā narakagāminaḥ |
bhūyaḥ sukṛtino bhūtvā prāpnuvanti śubhāṃ gatim || 3 ||
śṛṇu vyāsa purāvṛttaṃ daśārṇeṣu tu yacchubham |
tasya śiṣyā babhūvurhi sapta durmedhasastu te |
sa tānuvāca mā dhenuṃ bhakṣayāma gurorimām || 13 ||
mā guroḥ krodhanirdagdhā yāsyāma nidhanaṃ vayam || 14 ||
te yadā tadvaco naiva jagṛhuḥ kṣutprapīḍitāḥ |
mā no doṣadvayeneha lopo bhavatu śobhanāḥ |
evaṃ hyalpena doṣeṇa vayaṃ yokṣyāma sarvathā || 17 ||
atha dṛṣṭvā sa taṃ vatsaṃ dhenuṃ papraccha tāndvijaḥ |
atha teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā śaṅkayā ca durātmanām |
uvāca vatsaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kṛpayā duḥkhapīḍitaḥ || 22 ||
yuṣmābhirbhakṣitā sā hi tathyaṃ na kathitaṃ ca me |
karmaṇā tena tasmādvo gatiḥ kaṣṭā bhaviṣyati || 23 ||
kṛpayā sa ca tānāha bhūyaḥ sarvānidaṃ vacaḥ || 24 ||
yaduktaṃ tanmayā tathyaṃ na tanmithyā bhaviṣyati |
yeṣāṃ tu kṛtavantaḥ stha te vo dhāsyanti tacchubham || 25 ||
matsamīpe ca na stheyamidānīṃ vaḥ kathaṃcana |
dṛṣṭvā vatsamimaṃ bālaṃ mā vo dhakṣyāmi gacchata || 26 ||
atha te sahitāḥ sarve visaṃjñā naṣṭacetasaḥ |
daśārṇā nāma sā vyāsa saritpuṇyā sadājalā |
vyādhāḥ sarve 'bhavaṃste vai caitakā iti viśrutāḥ || 30 ||
teṣāṃ nāmāni yāni sma vyādhatve tāni me śṛṇu |
sā ca gauḥ pitṛkāryeṇa bhakṣitā vo na hiṃsayā |
bhūyaśca mānuṣā bhūtvā jātau jātau sacetanāḥ || 41 ||
tataḥ karma jugupsantaḥ pūrvajātikṛtaṃ ca yat |
bhavanto yanmayā pūrvamuktāstanna kṛtaṃ hi vaḥ |
śreyo vo 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ kurutaiva ca |
jātimetāṃ vimokṣyāma yena hāsyāma na smṛtim || 48 ||
saṃvardhitāśca kleśena mātrā pitrā tathaiva ca |
anāpṛṣṭvā kathaṃ tau tu mṛtyumicchāmahe vayam || 50 ||
te yūyaṃ yadi manyadhvamāpṛṣṭvā tau visarjitāḥ |
na cedvisarjayetāṃ tau tābhyāṃ śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ |
tato vayaṃ kṛtātmāna anṛṇāḥ sarvathāpi ca |
evamastviti te sarve gṛhītvā tasya tadvacaḥ |
tānāgatānpitā dṛṣṭvā mātā ca citakā tadā |
adyāvāṃ sudṛḍhaṃ mūḍhau kiṃ ciraṃ kṛtamityuta || 56 ||
nātti māṃsamimaṃ pakvaṃ surāṃ ca na pibatyayam || 57 ||
te 'pi jātiṃ jugupsantaḥ sarve vai pāpayonayaḥ |
idamūcuḥ kṣupaṃ caiva citakāṃ ca śubhaṃ vacaḥ || 58 ||
nāśnīma vayamadyāhaḥ śvo bhokṣyāmo na saṃśayaḥ || 59 ||
tau tu tuṣṭau samālakṣya sarve 'tha śirasā natāḥ |
sa kadācidvane ramye dhanuṣā kurute bhṛśam |
yogyāṃ tamahamāhedaṃ na tvaṃ vetsi dhanurnṛpa |
āmantraṇe bhojane ca vācā ca kuśalāḥ sadā || 66 ||
sa mayā hasatā prokta ānayasva dhanurmama |
yāvatkṣipāmi lakṣāya śaraṃ yatra bravīṣi mām || 67 ||
tenoktaṃ lakṣamuddiśya śaraḥ kṣipto mayā tataḥ || 68 ||
sa tena viddhastejasvī mamāra sahasaiva ca || 69 ||
so 'haṃ taṃ mṛtamālakṣya rājñā tena visarjitaḥ |
provāca na bhayaṃ te 'sti brahmavadhyā kutastava |
anayā bhāryayā sārdhaṃ sthito vai bahulāḥ samāḥ || 72 ||
sa kadācitpitā cāpi mama kālena saṃyutaḥ |
pitṛbhaktyā ca hi tayā samyagārādhanena ca |
nānaśanme smṛtiḥ putrā jñānaṃ me sampravartate || 76 ||
mātā ceyaṃ hi vo vetti sādhvī nityaṃ pativratā || 78 ||
yadahaṃ vo bravīmyadya tatkurudhvaṃ mama priyam |
anāmayā viśokāśca na ca saṃjñāṃ prahāsyatha || 79 ||
putrā janmedamantyaṃ me manuṣyatve na saṃśayaḥ |
ito mṛtena gantavyaṃ mayā brahmasadaḥ śubham || 80 ||
avaśyaṃ ca sutairmātā pitā caiva sukhaidhitaiḥ |
asādhayanta ātmānaṃ vyādhāḥ saptāpi te tadā |
kālañjare girau bhūyo mṛgāḥ saptaiva jajñire || 85 ||
mṛgatve yāni nāmāni teṣāṃ tāni nibodha me |
te saptasaṃkhyā vyādheṣu mṛgeṣu ca tathā punaḥ |
sarīdvīpa iti khyātaṃ kampilye vai saraḥ śubham |
śikhī jīvo 'tha vṛkṣaśca dhvaja ityeva te smṛtāḥ || 91 ||
sa tatsaraḥ samāsādya strībhiḥ saha mudānvitaḥ |
taṃ krīḍamānaṃ saṃdṛśya maruddevasya tatra vai |
yadyasyāhaṃ sutaḥ syāṃ vai prāpnuyāṃ rājyameva ca |
śikhaṇḍīti samākhyātaḥ sa tamāha tadā hasan || 96 ||
tatrāhaṃ te purodhāḥ syāṃ mamāpyeṣa manorathaḥ || 97 ||
acintayata tatrāhaṃ sacivaḥ syāṃ tava prabho || 98 ||
vayaṃ tava prabhāvena tīrṇāḥ kṛcchramidaṃ prabho |
śuśrūṣemaśca na pitṝnna sma saṃjñā tato bhavet || 104 ||
tato vayaṃ punaḥ śreyastava brūmaḥ śṛṇuṣva naḥ || 105 ||
jātāḥ punarmānuṣavigraheṣu yogeśvarāste traya eva rājye || 108 ||
catvāraste tu śaptāraḥ khagāḥ svacchandataḥ punaḥ |
itare 'pi trayo vyāsa karmaṇā svena coditāḥ |
purodhā dhṛtarātastu putraṃ sve karmaṇi prabhuḥ |
putraṃ sve karmaṇi sthāpya jagāma saha bhāryayā || 10 ||
tasthau sa veśmani sukhaṃ kubera iva puṣpake || 13 ||
cukopa kimidaṃ me 'dya vikṛtaṃ lakṣitaṃ tvayā || 16 ||
tāṃ sa rājā samāvignaḥ priyāṃ prāṇairgarīyasīm |
sā yadā bahu tathyaṃ ca ucyamānā na tuṣyati |
tadā tasyāḥ prasādārthe sa viṣṇuṃ samprasādayat || 18 ||
devaṃ sālavanaṃ gatvā pañcālena sahaiva saḥ |
etasminneva kāle tu catvāro brāhmaṇāḥ śubhāḥ |
vayaṃ yogeśvarāstāta siddhā vai svena karmaṇā || 24 ||
bhayaṃ taccaihikaṃ putrāḥ paratra ca durāsadam || 26 ||
kathaṃ gacchatha bhadraṃ vo nādharmaṃ paripaśyata || 27 ||
prayacchāma na saṃdeho yeṣu gatvā na śocasi || 28 ||
ihāpi loke dravyaṃ te vidhāsyāmastathā śṛṇu || 29 ||
sa vācayanneva nṛpo vṛttiṃ te saṃvidhāsyati || 30 ||
mene tadvai tathā sarvamanumene ca tānpunaḥ || 31 ||
nimittāni ca saṃlakṣya śubhāni sa narādhipaḥ |
sapta vyādhā daśārṇeṣu mṛgāḥ kālañjare girau |
te praviśya puraṃ caiva veśma caivāpyatandritāḥ |
iti ceti ca saṃcintya vanāya dadhire manaḥ || 41 ||
jānāmi tvāṃ rutajñaṃ ca jānāmi tvāṃ khagaṃ tathā |
śvo gacchāvo vanaṃ rājanmā kālaṃ pratipālaya || 45 ||
jagāma vanamuddiśya yogena ca divaṃ yayau || 46 ||
cakāra pāraṇaṃ caiva yakṣatvaṃ cāpyavāpa ha || 47 ||
evamastviti sā coktvā jagāmeṣṭāṃ gatiṃ tadā || 50 ||
bhartṛrūpeṇa gatvā ca kāmena sa vimohitaḥ |
atha hāla iti khyāto mṛgacārī mahātapāḥ |
kathayanti hi tāṃ devāḥ siddhāśca saha cāraṇaiḥ |
na ca tasyāḥ śubhāpāṅgyā antaraṃ sa bubodha ha |
sa brahmadhanvā tāṃ śrutvā tathā rūpavatīṃ satīm |
kṛtvā ca sumahadrūpaṃ vikṛtaṃ bhairavaṃ tadā |
mṛgaiḥ saha ca hālo 'pi jīvitaiṣī tadā gataḥ || 58 ||
ekākinīṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmadhanvā durātmavān |
mā bhīrbhavatu te bhadre patiste 'haṃ sumadhyame |
mṛgarājo gato 'sau ca samāśvasa mama priye || 61 ||
so 'yaṃ kāmayituṃ prāptaḥ kiṃ na syādantaraiṣivān |
tāmidaṃ cocivānhṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ cintayase hṛdā || 64 ||
nanu te 'haṃ priyo bhartā mā krudho varavarṇini || 65 ||
bubudhe sā ca taṃ duṣṭaṃ karmaṇā tena śobhanā || 67 ||
na tvaṃ mama patirmūḍha śakrastvaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ |
papāta dharaṇīpṛṣṭhe svaṃ ca rūpaṃ prapadyata || 69 ||
na mādṛśī tvayā kācidanyā hyāsāditā purā || 71 ||
aśaktaścāpi hantuṃ tvaṃ bhavitā mānuṣaṃ kvacit |
ṣaṣṭhe ca kāle samprāpte mṛgaṃ bhakṣyamavāpsyasi || 74 ||
so 'pi duḥkhena saṃtapto manvānastāṃ hateti ca |
na duṣyanti striyaḥ sādhvi nadyo yadvaddhi jantubhiḥ |
na caiva śakto dharmeṇa saṃguptāṃ tvāṃ pradharṣitum |
yathā viṣeṇa saṃchannamannaṃ bhoktuṃ hi mānavaḥ || 82 ||
rūpeṇāpratimā sādhvī na tasyāḥ strī samā kvacit || 85 ||
na śakyate ca sā prāptuṃ na dūtībhirna karmaṇā |
na dānena na saṃmānairna balānna ca sevayā || 88 ||
na cāpi sāhamasmīti na ca nāsmītyathābravīt || 89 ||
na krodho nāpi darpo 'syā na ca māno na matsaraḥ |
evaṃ vai bhāskaro vāyurvaruṇaścandra eva ca |
neyaṃ kupyati yuṣmākaṃ jāne hyasyā vrataṃ śubham || 94 ||
matto 'pi vo bhayaṃ nāsti nāhaṃ kupye kathaṃcana |
pavitrāḥ sarvataḥ śuddhā aduṣṭāḥ striya eva hi || 97 ||
kastvāṃ samartho devo 'pi spraṣṭumanyaḥ kuto janaḥ || 99 ||
yato 'sya kāmarūpitvaṃ yena mattaḥ sadā hyabhūt |
tata eva punaḥ śreyaḥ prāpsyate madanugrahāt || 103 ||
sa eṣa vyāsa duṣṭātmā viśvāmitrāśrame rataḥ |
ya imaṃ tasya māhātmyaṃ dhārayecchrāvayīta vā |
svayambhuvi gate devī tapaso virarāma ha |
sā tuṣṭā varadānena cintayantī tadā varam |
vyajñāpayata sā devī brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te || 15 ||
mūrdhnyupāghrāya tāṃ devīṃ pariṣvajya ca pīḍitam |
kauśikīti ca nāmnā tvaṃ khyātiṃ loke gamiṣyasi |
itthaṃ tvāṃ nāmabhirdivyaiḥ stoṣyanti munayaḥ sadā || 20 ||
vyarocayata sā devī vāsāya śikharaṃ gireḥ |
ya imaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ |
kauśikyāḥ sambhavaṃ samyaksa yāti paramāṃ gatim || 31 ||
praṇipatya varaṃ vavre mayi sāṃnidhyamastu te || 3 ||
nāma caiva mama khyātiṃ tava nāmnābhilakṣitam |
agniśca varadāṃ vavre mā gāḥ kopaṃ mayīśvari |
atha sā tejasāṃ dhāma patiṃ sarvajagatpatim |
ṛṣīṃstato vandyatamābhivandya janaṃ ca teṣāṃ pratipūjya pūjyā || 10 ||
utpapāta tato vyoma sā sārdhaṃ somanandinā |
athāsau brahmaṇaḥ putraṃ vyāsaḥ prāha kṛtāñjaliḥ |
kimarthaṃ kauśikī vindhyaṃ devyā sampreṣitā tadā || 1 ||
vavre girīndratanayāṃ prāha sā ca tathāstviti || 4 ||
purā vindhyo 'bravītsūryaṃ kasmāttvaṃ na karoṣi mām |
pradakṣiṇaṃ yathā meruṃ kā te 'vajñā mayi prabho || 8 ||
taṃ vāraya mahāprājña gatirnaḥ sarvadā bhavān || 11 ||
atha papraccha taṃ vyāsaḥ pitāmahasutaṃ prabhum |
ke te kasya kimarthaṃ vā kauśikyā dānavā hatāḥ |
tapasyādhāya tau ceto gokarṇaṃ prati jagmatuḥ |
athovāca tato vyāso gokarṇaṃ kathayasva me |
kasmindeśe kimarthaṃ vā kena votpāditaṃ purā || 22 ||
hate triśirasi tvaṣṭā putre jyāyasi vajriṇā |
tato maharṣibhiḥ sṛṣṭā jṛmbhikā taṃ samāviśat || 27 ||
tasya yogabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā vīryaṃ śauryaṃ ca saṃyuge |
tato bhītāḥ surāḥ sarve brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ || 29 ||
upāyaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yenāsau jīyate yudhi || 31 ||
sa naḥ praṇāmairbhaktyā ca stutyā cārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ |
tvaṃ sraṣṭrī sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃhartrī tvaṃ sureśvari |
tvaṃ prabhā śarvarī jyotsnā kīrtistuṣṭirumā dhṛtiḥ |
buddhirmedhā smṛtiḥ prajñā sandhyā kāntiḥ stutirmatiḥ || 39 ||
ulkā satī gireḥ putrī maineyī brahmacāriṇī |
atha sā śaiśavaṃ hitvā tanumanyāṃ samādade |
uvācedaṃ ca suprītā varadāsmi tava prabho |
bhavāni bhava me nityaṃ suprasannā maheśvari || 55 ||
atha viṣṇurdrutaṃ gatvā śṛṅge jagrāha taṃ prabhum |
tatra gatvā naro bhaktyā praṇipatya maheśvaram |
udanvataḥ sthitaṃ tīre svayameva tu dakṣiṇe || 70 ||
yaḥ śṛṇoti naro nityaṃ puṇyaṃ gokarṇasambhavam |
amaratvaṃ tu vavrāte tau praṇamya pitāmaham |
evamastviti tābhyāṃ taṃ varaṃ dattvā pitāmahaḥ |
pure 'pratibhaye ramye kāntāṃ nāma tataḥ sabhām |
anye ca dānavā bhejurāsanāni tadā mune |
vireje sā sabhā tatra dānavendraiḥ samāgataiḥ |
tāneva prathamaṃ hatvā tato jeṣyāma devatāḥ || 94 ||
asmatto devatai rājyaṃ lokaṃ hatvā purā hṛtam |
sampannāḥ sarvathā devā na yuddhaṃ taiḥ saheṣyate || 109 ||
na cakrurdānavāḥ pūrvaṃ kurvate na ca sāmpratam || 112 ||
prāpsyāmo vā gatiṃ puṇyāṃ nihatāḥ samare 'maraiḥ || 114 ||
viditaṃ vaḥ samastānāṃ pūrvajā bhavatāṃ yathā |
saṃdhāya devataiḥ sārdhaṃ vṛttiṃ kurmaḥ svakarmabhiḥ || 117 ||
atha te tasya vacanaṃ sarva evānumenire |
madhye sundo nisundaśca mayaḥ śambhuḥ kharo muraḥ |
tasya prodbhūtaye yāmaḥ sarve pārśvaṃ pinākinaḥ |
tamārādhya tathā kurmo yathā syānmadanaḥ punaḥ || 9 ||
atha te brahmaṇā sārdhaṃ tayā cāsuravidviṣaḥ |
atha liṅgaṃ samuttasthau teṣāṃ madhye divaukasām |
yuṣmadarthe vimokṣyāmi kāryaṃ vo yaḥ kariṣyati |
neme mūrtiṃ tadā pūrvāṃ niḥsasāra tato mukham |
atha sā dakṣiṇāṃ mūrtiṃ praṇeme cārudarśanā |
ātmasaṃsthaṃ purā tejo dagdhvā yanmadanaṃ kṛtam |
yasmādiyaṃ māṃ yūyaṃ ca maṇḍalena pradakṣiṇam || 27 ||
cakre sarve suraśreṣṭhāḥ sthānaṃ tasmādidaṃ mama |
yuṣmābhiḥ sarvadā yuktaṃ bhaviṣyati mama priyam || 30 ||
pūjyā ceha sadā sthāne vandyā caiva bhaviṣyati || 33 ||
kālaṃ mṛtyuṃ ca mohaṃ ca viṣādaṃ cāmitadyutiḥ || 35 ||
kaḥ kaḥ katama āyāta ihādyeti surarṣabhāḥ |
tau tadā nirgatau tatra tayorjīvau durātmanoḥ |
buddhvā tau ca tadā janma dānavābhyāmariṃdamau |
tuṣṭo 'smi yuvayoḥ putrau varaṃ kiṃ vā dadāmyaham || 56 ||
prārthanāṃ tāṃ tayoḥ śrutvā pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ || 57 ||
jaganmātaiva yā kanyā vinā tasyāḥ pitāmaha |
anye ca koṭiśo dṛptā hataśeṣāḥ suradviṣaḥ || 65 ||
ye sahāyā hi vāṃ pitrorbabhūvuḥ suravidviṣaḥ |
āgatya taṃ tadā yajñaṃ mamṛduḥ suraśatravaḥ || 76 ||
ādhipatyaṃ hi naḥ kṛtsne bhūrloke kaśyapādhunā |
balaṃ sarvaṃ samānāyya kṛtvā saṃgrāmikīḥ kriyāḥ || 80 ||
atha te dānavā dṛṣṭvā padmavyūhaṃ divaukasām |
sādinaḥ sādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ nāgā nāgai rathā rathaiḥ |
chindhi bhindhi sahedānīṃ tiṣṭha mūḍha kva gacchasi |
na yoddhavyaṃ surā daityairavadhyā vaḥ suradviṣaḥ || 110 ||
āgatāṃ tatra tāṃ siddhiṃ puṇyānāṃ karmaṇāmiva || 4 ||
kaḥ pitā te 'navadyāṅgi kā vā mātā tavānaghe |
vihāya māṃ purā bālāṃ mātāpyanugatā patim || 12 ||
vasa vindhye girau ramye yogyāṃ ca kuru sarvadā || 13 ||
iti devyā vacaḥ śrutvā mūkaḥ saṃhṛṣṭamānasaḥ |
apūrvamadya dṛṣṭaṃ me strīratnaṃ śikhare gireḥ || 18 ||
na tādṛśā manuṣyeṣu na deveṣvasti sundarī |
na rakṣaḥsu na yakṣeṣu na gandharvapureṣu vā || 19 ||
na nāgeṣu na siddheṣu na daityapativeśmasu |
kā tvaṃ kasya kimarthaṃ vā vasasīha girāviti |
atha sumbhasya hṛdaye mūkasya vacasā saha |
gaccha mūka madarthe tāṃ pralobhaya sumadhyamām || 24 ||
atha devī smitaṃ kṛtvā prasannamabhivīkṣya tam |
iti pṛṣṭastadā devyā prāha mūkaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ |
ārye daityeśvaraḥ sumbhaḥ patnītvena vṛṇoti te || 29 ||
māṃ vinirjitya daityo 'sau patnīṃ vai kartumarhati |
patyā dānavadaityānāṃ kiṃ te yuddhena bhāmini || 33 ||
kruddhasya tasya samare na śaśāka nirīkṣitum |
śrutvā tadvacanaṃ tasya prāha devī smayanniva |
dautyenāsi yataḥ prāpto mayāto na vihanyase || 36 ||
atha praṇamya tāṃ mūko yayau pārśvaṃ suradviṣaḥ |
sā mayā prārthitā kanyā tvadarthe dānavottama |
tṛṇāni mama saṃgrāme daityā iti savismayā || 39 ||
tattadā vacanaṃ tasyā mūkenoktaṃ niśāmya saḥ |
tasyāṃ siṃhāsane haime svāstīrṇe mahati sthire |
jitvā tāṃ prasabhaṃ kanyāṃ samare garvaśālinīm |
atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā śambhurnāma mahāsuraḥ |
ākāraḥ kaḥ punastasyāḥ kā vā ceṣṭāsurādhipa |
yaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstatra mayo matimatāṃ varaḥ |
tadalaṃ te tayā rājansanti kanyāḥ sumadhyamāḥ |
prāha vākyaṃ tadā sumbho vihasyetthaṃ mahāsuraḥ || 62 ||
yadi sā devataiḥ sṛṣṭā kṛtyā dānavaśāsane |
ahatvā dānavānāśu tadā sā na viraṃsyate || 63 ||
āhatya bherīḥ saṃnāhyā ditijā dānavāśca te |
aśivaṃ ca śivā nedurdīptāyāṃ diśi saṃsthitāḥ || 12 ||
pratīpaṃ ca vavau teṣāṃ rajogarbhaḥ samīraṇaḥ |
rarāsa paruṣaṃ vyoma cacāla ca vasundharā || 14 ||
gṛhāṇa śulkamiti tāṃ brūhi gatvā sumadhyamām || 16 ||
evamastviti sā procya taṃ visṛjya ca dānavam |
uvāca ca mahāyogā tā devīḥ purataḥ sthitāḥ |
netuṃ māṃ kila saṃgrāme vijitya raṇamūrdhani |
iti tābhyo varaṃ dattvā samādiśya ca tāstadā |
atha sā svarathaṃ mahārathā manasācintayadacyutā tadā |
purataḥ samavekṣya kauśikī sukṛtaṃ hemamayaṃ nabhaścaram || 37 ||
jagrāha vijayā chattraṃ siṃhī sūtā tadābhavat |
papuśca rudhiraṃ devyaḥ prāṇaiḥ saha suradviṣām || 7 ||
mattāḥ praticchannamukhāśca kecidgandhena vijñāya gajaṃ gajendrāḥ |
tāraṃ viresuḥ samarājireṣu krauñcā iva vyoma śaranniśānte || 13 ||
devyaḥ samutsārya raṇe ripūṇāmuccairvineduḥ prasabhaṃ balāni |
kruddhāḥ suyattā rathināṃ variṣṭhā visphārya citrāṇi śarāsanāni || 22 ||
devyo 'pi saṃyattatarā rathasthāḥ kruddhā javenātha tadābhisasruḥ |
drumeṇa lakṣmīryudhi saṃsasañje mayena kāntiḥ saramā mureṇa |
ghanena caṇḍā niyatiḥ khareṇa prabhāvatī dhundhumayātsaroṣā || 24 ||
daityā yuyutsotsukamānasāste devīḥ samāyāḥ svabhujaiḥ saśastraiḥ |
te pūrṇamāsyāṃ vighane dinānte bhāsāṃ samūhā iva candrasaurāḥ || 28 ||
nirastabhogā nibiḍā bṛhanto nigīrṇajihvā iva pannagendrāḥ || 29 ||
meghasvanasyātha raṇe tadānīṃ kruddhā śaraughānvisasarja ṣaṣṭhī |
nikṛtya bāṇānditijaḥ purastāṃścikṣepa ṣaṣṭhyā daśa rukmapuṅkhān |
tānāśu ṣaṣṭhī prativārya daityaṃ vivyādha ṣaṣṭyā tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ || 32 ||
chittvā śarāṃstasya śarairvicitrairvivyādha taṃ vakṣasi pañcaṣaṣṭyā |
bhinnaḥ sa tairāśu tathā vireje vyomnyarkapādairiva vārivāhaḥ || 35 ||
āprutya daityo 'tha rathāddhatāśvātpragṛhya carmāsivaraṃ ca dhautam || 36 ||
taccarma tasyāpatataḥ śaraughaiścakarta mṛtyuḥ śataśaḥ śitāgraiḥ || 37 ||
abhyadravanmṛtyumṛbhūṃ tadānīṃ khe rohiṇīṃ megha ivābhividyut || 38 ||
ajihmagāste vividhāḥ supatritā drumasya gātreṣu nipeturāhave |
lakṣmīṃ tataḥ kiṃpuruṣādhipo 'sau vivyādha bāṇairdaśabhiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ |
lakṣmyāstato daityapatiḥ śitena bhallena ciccheda rathadhvajāgram |
aśvāṃśca tasyāścaturaścaturbhiḥ sūtaṃ ca vivyādha śareṇa tūrṇam || 44 ||
nārācamādāya tato 'sya lakṣmīrjaghāna sūtaṃ yudhi devaśatroḥ |
vivyādha vāhāṃśca pṛthakpṛṣatkairdhvajaṃ ca ciccheda rathasya tūrṇam || 45 ||
yantrā vinā tasya rathaṃ tadānīṃ te sāyakairapratimaiḥ prataptāḥ |
chidraṃ samāsedaturapradhṛṣyau kiṃcinna tau tatra parasparasya || 49 ||
aśveṣu sūte sarathe dhvaje ca sarveṣu gātrāvayaveṣu cāsya |
kruddhātha kāntiḥ samare mayasya nārācamukhyena supatritena |
jñātvaiva kāntyāḥ samare prabhāvaṃ vihāya yuddhaṃ viyadutpapāta || 53 ||
vivyādha tīkṣṇaiḥ saramā raṇājire bāṇairmuraṃ dānavadaityayūthapam |
kruddhātha devī niśitena tasya ciccheda bhallena dhanurvicitram |
anyaddhanuḥ so 'tha tadā gṛhītvā vivyādha devyāścaturasturaṃgān || 55 ||
bhūmau nipetuḥ samare śvasantaḥ prāṇāñjahuścāśu samaṃ samastāḥ || 56 ||
utpatya khaṃ tasya tadā jaghāna yantāramaśvāṃśca mahāpramāṇān || 57 ||
vivyādha caṇḍā ghanamāpatantaṃ śaraiḥ śitāgrairyudhi rukmapuṅkaiḥ |
ciccheda daityo 'pi samucchritāgraṃ dhvajaṃ turaṃgāṃśca jaghāna devyāḥ |
hitvā rathau tāvavatīrya bhūmiṃ gṛhītacarmāsivarau prayattau || 62 ||
tāṃstāṃśca mārgāṃl laghupādacārau chidraṃ na cānyonyamavāpatustau || 63 ||
utprutya vegena tadātha tasya śirodharāmāśu cakarta caṇḍā |
sa kṛttamūrdhā nipapāta tasyāṃ saṃgrāmabhūmāvurasāśu daityaḥ || 65 ||
sa śoṇitādigdhavapustadānīṃ ghanaḥ parāsuḥ patito dharitryām |
vivyādha tīkṣṇairniyatiḥ supatraiḥ kharaṃ śarairvakṣasi hemapuṅkhaiḥ |
viddhaḥ sa tairabhyapatatsaroṣo devīṃ jighāṃsuḥ samare 'rihantā |
gurvīṃ gadāṃ cāśu tadā gṛhītvā cikṣepa devyā rudhirāktamūrttiḥ || 68 ||
saṃcūrṇayāmāsa rathaṃ niyatyā yantrīṃ dhvajaṃ cāśu samucchritāgram || 69 ||
abhyetya taṃ dānavayodhamukhyaṃ khaḍgena madhye 'sya śiraḥ paphāla || 70 ||
sa dānavo visphuṭitottamāṅgaḥ kṣitau vireje srutaraktadhāraḥ |
nihatya caikena rathasya sūtamekena cāsya dhvajamuccakarta || 73 ||
ādāya daityaḥ parighaṃ mahāntamāprutya vāhādabhitaḥ sasāra |
nyapātayattaṃ parighaṃ rathe 'syā girernitambe kuliśaṃ yathendraḥ || 77 ||
dṛṣṭvā sa tāṃ tatra tadāpayātāṃ tameva lauhaṃ parighaṃ gṛhītvā |
utpatya sā divyavarāstramuktaiḥ kṣurapramukhyaiḥ parighaṃ cakarta |
udyamya muṣṭiṃ nibiḍaṃ tato 'syā bhūyo 'tha daityo viyadutpapāta || 80 ||
daityāpi te vāraṇamūrdhni sannā visphārayanto vibabhurdhanūṃṣi |
sendrāyudhāḥ sāśaniśabdagarbhāḥ śaileṣu meghā iva saṃnilīnāḥ || 5 ||
citrāḥ patākā vividhā dhvajāśca paraspareṇāhanane gajebhyaḥ || 9 ||
yodhā nipetuḥ pariniṣṭananto viddhāḥ śarairmarmasu devatābhiḥ |
saphenamāsyai rudhiraṃ vamanto dhanūṃṣi sajjāni karairdadhānāḥ || 10 ||
gandhena nāgāḥ samadāḥ parītya vinamya kiṃcidvadanairvineduḥ || 12 ||
chinnāni vaktrāṇi sakuṇḍalāni bhujāḥ saśastrāśca sucandanāktāḥ |
vipusphururjyāḥ parikṛṣya muktāḥ śarābhividdhāśca gajā niṣeduḥ || 14 ||
visphārayantau dhanuṣī vicitre yuddhāya yattau parighorubāhū || 19 ||
jyāniṃ javasyātha turaṃgamānāṃ madapramoṣaṃ ca mahādvipānām |
cetovimohaṃ suravidviṣāṃ ca cāpasvanenaiva cakāra devī || 21 ||
ājau samāsthāya paraṃ prayatnaṃ śarāḥ surāṇāṃ ripubhiḥ samastāḥ |
aprāpya devīṃ patitāḥ pṛthivyāṃ parājayaṃ prāhurivāsurāṇām || 22 ||
cakampire yodhavarāḥ suradviṣāṃ samaṃ samastāḥ samare śarāhatāḥ || 24 ||
dīptaiḥ śaraughaiḥ samare 'maradviṣāṃ sainyāni tadvatpradadāha kauśikī || 25 ||
chāyāṃ yathā sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ madhyaṃdine 'lpāṃ kurute vivasvān |
devī tathā tāṃ dhvajinīṃ ripūṇāmalpāvaśiṣṭāṃ samare cakāra || 26 ||
āhūya devīmatha dānavādhipau visphārya cāpe mahatī 'bhiseratuḥ |
cāpeṣu yantryāṃ hariṣu dhvajeṣu mahābhujau krodhaparītacittau |
vivyādha daityau yudhi rukmapuṅkhaiḥ suparvabhirbāṇavaraiḥ supatraiḥ || 29 ||
te vyomni bāṇaiḥ śataśo nikṛtya suparvabhirhāṭakacārupuṅkhaiḥ |
ciccheda devī kavace vicitre tayoḥ kṣuraprairaparaiḥ śitāgraiḥ || 31 ||
jaghāna cāśvānatha sārathī ca dhvajau ca citrau rathayoścakarta |
uṭajeṣu ca viśvastā munayaḥ śerate sukham || 8 ||
jalāni devi saritaḥ svacchāni śiśirāṇi ca |
kṛtsnaṃ rakṣa ca bhūrlokaṃ pūjyamānā sadāvyaye || 37 ||
śarvāṇī ca pariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya kauśikīm |
arcayanti yathā māṃ ca surā yakṣā mahoragāḥ |
samudrā vasavo lakṣmī sandhyā kīrtiḥ sarasvatī || 63 ||
pāhi kṛtsnāṃ bhuvaṃ devi bhaginī tvaṃ mamāvyaye || 67 ||
iha loke sukhaṃ prāpya sa yāti paramāṃ gatim || 70 ||
atha tā devatā devī kauśikī dehasambhavāḥ |
lambauṣṭhīṃ vṛṣadaṃśāṃ ca kiṃnarīṃ caiva siṃhale || 2 ||
ābhīreṣu śivāṃ caiva śāntiṃ ca varaṇātaṭe || 3 ||
pracaṇḍāṃ ca tukhāreṣu kausaleṣu ca lambikām |
jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva svapure saṃnyaveśayat || 5 ||
kāśmīreṣu sthitā ṣaṣṭhī saramā malayeṣu ca || 6 ||
pūtanāṃ ca suvīreṣu mṛtyuṃ piṣṭapure tathā |
aspṛṣṭāṃ madhyadeśe tu kiṃnarīṃ barbareṣu ca |
śeṣāśca devatāḥ sarvā grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca |
tasya yajñaṃ jagāmātha devī tena nimantritā || 11 ||
ājagāmāśu taṃ deśaṃ mahiṣo nāma dānavaḥ || 12 ||
atha dṛṣṭvā sa tāṃ devīṃ krodhādraktatarekṣaṇaḥ |
taṃ kauśikī vīkṣya tadāpatantaṃ daityendraputraṃ mahiṣaṃ saroṣam |
abhyetya tāṃ dānavarājasūnurbalena mattaḥ parameṇa devīm |
viṣahya taṃ tasya tadā prahāraṃ jagrāha śṛṅge mahiṣaṃ kareṇa |
udbhrāmya coccaiḥ paritaḥ saroṣā nyapātayadbhūmitale śvasantam || 21 ||
udgṛhya sā vāladhimindraśatroḥ kṛtvā ca pādaṃ śirasi prasahya |
tapaḥ kṛtvā tadā devī puṣkalaṃ himavatsutā || 1 ||
somanandī ca śārdūlaḥ kimavāpa varaṃ śubham |
etanme pṛcchato brūhi bhaktāya praṇatāya ca || 3 ||
yaṃ paṭhanti sadā sāṃkhyāḥ puruṣaṃ pañcaviṃśakam || 4 ||
praṇamya parayā bhaktyā śirasā taṃ trilocanam || 5 ||
tatpravakṣyāmi te sarvaṃ śṛṇu yogavidāṃ vara || 6 ||
tato nandīśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaktaṃ premṇā girīndrajā |
nandī samprekṣya tāṃ cāpi gaurāṅgīṃ hemasaprabhām |
namaḥ siddhyai mahādevyai rataye gataye namaḥ |
tvaṃ kriyā kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ ca prakṛtirmuktireva ca || 11 ||
bhava devi prasannā me bhaktasya praṇatasya ca || 14 ||
atha devī tadā dṛṣṭvā nandinaṃ pādayornatam |
provāca varadāsmīti sa ca vavre varaṃ śubham || 15 ||
agrato 'syā yayau nandī somanandī ca pṛṣṭhataḥ |
diṣṭyāsi prītavadanā diṣṭyā ca saphalaṃ tapaḥ |
diṣṭyā cedaṃ varaṃ varṇaṃ gauraṃ kanakasaprabham || 20 ||
priyaṃ naḥ sarvathā devi paramaṃ yattvamāgatā |
mamaivānucaraḥ pārśve kṛto yogī ca śaṃkara |
parituṣṭo 'smi te devi varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam |
taṃ bhūyo 'pi tvayā sārdhaṃ draṣṭumicchāmi śaṃkara || 31 ||
nārī vātha naro vāpi lokaṃ gauryāḥ sa yāsyati || 42 ||
sa gāṇapatyaṃ samprāpya mayā sārdhaṃ cariṣyati |
kathayāmāsa tāṃ devyai śilāṃ paśyeti sa prabhuḥ || 45 ||
tamāha devī deveśamiha taptaṃ mayā tapaḥ |
bhavettaptaṃ tapastena lokaṃ ca tava yāsyati || 47 ||
so 'pi yāsyati te lokaṃ gaṇapaśca bhaviṣyati || 48 ||
stanayoḥ prasrute dhāre mahatyau me tadāsakṛt |
ete tābhyāṃ kṛte kuṇḍe sitatoye mahāplave || 52 ||
tayā hīdaṃ mahatkuṇḍaṃ dvitīyaṃ me kṛtaṃ śubham || 53 ||
śarīrānme tadā deva kṛṣṇā kośī vyaniṣkramat |
idaṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ śubhraṃ sthāpitaṃ tatpurā mayā || 56 ||
atha śrutvā mahādevaḥ pārvatyā vacanaṃ prabhuḥ |
pratyuvāca tadā devīṃ prītyā paramayā yutaḥ || 57 ||
stanatoyena ye pūrṇe tava kuṇḍe śaśiprabhe |
upavāsī naro yo 'tra snātvābhyarcya ca devatāḥ |
mṛtaśca sa naro devi yatra tatra yathā tathā |
ihopoṣya śuciḥ snātvā bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ |
idaṃ drakṣyati yo vipraḥ svargastasya na durlabhaḥ || 74 ||
tadeva labhate devi dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇājinaṃ dvijaḥ || 75 ||
vatsyāmi caiva satataṃ tvayā sārdhamiha priye |
evaṃ nagendraṃ sa tadānugṛhya munīndra sārdhaṃ girirājaputryā |
